11012811.Subtitle: Sir, I found this...

11012812.ContentTC: 哦！居然給你撿到了，謝啦。
11012812.Subtitle: Oh, you found it! Thanks for bringing it back.

11012814.ContentTC: 啊，哦，她是從前鄰居家的小姑娘啊，哈哈……
11012814.Subtitle: Oh, ah... She is just my neighbour's little girl. Haha...

11012815.ContentTC: ……算了，不瞞你了。達芙涅是我女兒，你沒猜錯。
11012815.Subtitle: ...I suppose it's time for the truth — You're right. Daphne is my daughter.

11012816.ContentTC: 說起來還挺不好意思的，這是我跟那孩子一起拍的最後一張照片……那之後沒多久，她母親就帶著她離開了。“塞奧多爾”這個姓氏，是她母親的。
11012816.Subtitle: This is the last photo we took together before she and her mother left. Daphne took the last name "Theodore" from her mother.

11012817.ContentTC: 不過這件事你別說出去啊，我們就是為了不讓人知道達芙涅是我女兒，才離婚的。
11012817.Subtitle: Don't tell anyone about this. We divorced specifically to keep people from knowing that Daphne is my daughter.

11012818.ContentTC: 首席煉金術師很喜歡達芙涅，說她會成為未來帝國最優秀的煉金術師。他早已宣布不再招收學生，卻為這孩子破例了。
11012818.Subtitle: The chief alchemist thinks very highly of Daphne and believes she has what it takes to become the Empire's top alchemist. He'd sworn off taking more apprentices, but he made an exception for this kid.

11012820.ContentTC: 她確實在煉金術上很有天賦，但佩劍煉金院那種地方，最不缺的就是天才。首席煉金術師說，達芙涅是特別的，因為她擁有一些其他煉金術師沒有的東西。
11012820.Subtitle: She's talented, but it's more than that. The Spathatoi is never short on talent. The chief alchemist said Daphne has a unique gift that sets her apart.

11012821.ContentTC: 他的話我也沒聽太明白，但有一點是明確的，達芙涅有很好的前途。所以，絕對不能有一個卡戎之民的父親阻礙她的道路——她母親是這樣認為的。
11012821.Subtitle: I don't quite understand what he meant by that, but it's clear that Daphne has a promising future. So, we must not let a Charon father stand in her way — at least that's what her mother thought.

11012823.ContentTC: 不知道。她打小心思就單純，也很黏我，怎麽能告訴她這個。
11012823.Subtitle: No. She has a heart of gold and adores her old man. How can I tell her?

11012824.ContentTC: 所以我就裝作是一個拋妻棄女的壞父親，她走在路上叫我爸爸，我就會跟她說，“閉嘴，叫什麽爸爸、套什麽近乎呢，叫長官。”
11012824.Subtitle: So, I play the part of a bad father who's done with family life. And when Daphne calls me dad, I tell her, "Zip it. I'm not your father. Address me as your superior officer."

11012825.ContentTC: 可她還是太懂事了，連罵我的話都罵不出口，只能和自己鬧別扭。
11012825.Subtitle: But Daphne's such a sweet kid. She couldn't bring herself to curse at me, and always ended up blaming herself instead.

11012826.ContentTC: 她其實並不喜歡煉金院。您和夫人應該考慮一下她的想法。
11012826.Subtitle: Actually, she doesn't like the Academy. Perhaps you and the missus should also take her preferences into consideration.

11012827.ContentTC: 我已經知道了。這次她非要轉到龍莎特別行動隊來，她母親怎麽勸都不聽，還瞞著我向富爾維斯遞交申請，可見她是真的不想待在煉金院了。
11012827.Subtitle: I knew about that already. Daphne volunteered to join the Lonza Fortress mission and refused to be dissuaded by her mother. She even submitted her application to Fulvis behind my back. That girl was dead set on quitting the Academy.

11012828.ContentTC: ……等回去，我和她母親好好談談吧。
11012828.Subtitle: ...I'll talk to her mother about this when we return.

11012829.ContentTC: 您也犧牲了很多……辛苦了。
11012829.Subtitle: You've made a huge sacrifice... You're a good father.

11012830.ContentTC: ……我倒是希望她再多記恨我一些，至少這樣，她自己會好過點。
11012830.Subtitle: ...I'd rather her resent me if it spares her any pain.

11012831.ContentTC: 唉，要是能回去的話，就請她去看戲吧。我是個大頭兵出身，以前從沒陪她進過歌劇院，就當把小時候的份也一起補上吧。
11012831.Subtitle: If we make it back, I'll take her to the opera house. When I was just a grunt, I never got the chance to take her to any fancy places. I guess it's time to make it up to her.

11012832.ContentTC: 聽說迪斯瑪尼亞最近新上了一出戲，從北邊科賽托斯那邊傳來的，叫雪國什麽什麽……到時候我多買張票，你也一起吧。
11012832.Subtitle: I heard there's a new show in Dismania, coming from the northern province of Cocytus. It's called "something... in the Snowfield"... You know what — why don't you come along? I'll buy an extra ticket.

11012901.Subtitle: These ones are tough to deal with. Be cautious!

11012903.Subtitle: Wait... The defence system here is off?

11012904.ContentTC: 中央控製室空無一人……同盟的“信使”已經撤離了？
11012904.Subtitle: The central control room is empty... Has the Messenger left already?

11012905.ContentTC: {nickname2}，這裡不太對勁。按要塞原始的設計圖，中央控製室作為核心，擁有最頂尖的防禦系統，甚至配備了自毀裝置。
11012905.Subtitle: , something's off here. The original blueprints of the fortress show this room should have the strongest defence system, including a self-destruct mechanism.

11012906.ContentTC: 但現在……雖然門被鎖上了，但沒有任何防禦裝置啟動的跡象。你怎麽看？
11012906.Subtitle: But they've only locked the door, and there's no sign of any defence systems engaging. What do you make of this?

11012907.ContentTC: 這是讓我們懈怠的招數，一定還有其他陷阱。
11012907.Subtitle: Probably a ruse to lower our guard. There might be other traps.

11012908.ContentTC: 他們也許預料到了我們來這兒會格外慎重，所以陷阱也布置得很隱蔽？
11012908.Subtitle: They probably predicted we would be extra cautious around this place, so they cleverly concealed their real traps.

11012909.ContentTC: 嗯，中央控製室已是奪回要塞的最後一步。他們在前面做了那麽多陷阱，不至於在最後一步前功盡棄。
11012909.Subtitle: True. The central control room is key to regaining control of the fortress. It doesn't add up that they'd leave it undefended after all the elaborate traps we've encountered.

11012910.ContentTC: 也許我們想多了，神棄者同盟的人根本不會操作這個房間的機關。
11012910.Subtitle: Maybe we're overthinking it. Perhaps The Forsakens never figured out how to operate the controls in this room.

11012911.ContentTC: 他們在前面布設了那麽多機關，真的會在最後一步毫無防備嗎？
11012911.Subtitle: But given the number of traps they've set up along the way, it seems unlikely they'd ignore this crucial area.

11012912.ContentTC: 不過，就算這兒是陷阱，我們也咬著牙踩進來了，眼下還是要專註於任務。
11012912.Subtitle: Trap or not, we have our objectives. Proceed with caution and stay mission-focused.

11012913.ContentTC: 接下來我要用我的秘鑰接管控製臺。我們已經打進了中央控製室，只差這最後一步了。
11012913.Subtitle: I'm about to access the fortress's control panel with my key. If all goes well, that should complete our mission.

11012914.ContentTC: 明白。那我四處轉轉，排查一下有無可疑之處。
11012914.Subtitle: Understood. I'll take a look around for anything suspicious.

11012915.ContentTC: 小心點，裡面可能還有敵人。
11012915.Subtitle: Be careful, there may be more enemies inside.

11013001.ContentTC: “十三軍團會在兩日內發起突襲。安東尼·富爾維斯向西比爾立下軍令狀，若他的槍管無法打破要塞的堅壁，就打破自己的腦殼。西比爾把一批精銳撥給了他。”
11013001.Subtitle: "The 13th Legion will attack in two days. Antonius Fulvis has vowed before Sibylle that if his forces fail to breach the fortress, he would shoot himself with his own gun. Sibylle then assigned him the best troops."

11013002.ContentTC: “軍團是一定要收復龍莎要塞的，守住要塞的事就別想了。當下最要緊的是快點從要塞撤離，以保存我們神棄者同盟的有生力量。”
11013002.Subtitle: "The Legion will do everything they can to take Lonza Fortress back. We should not attempt to defend the Fortress against such odds. Withdraw our forces and ensure the survival of The Forsakens."

11013003.ContentTC: “只是撤退的話，太可惜了。我們總得讓這些海伯利亞的走狗吃點苦頭。”
11013003.Subtitle: "Merely retreating would squander a perfect opportunity. We should make the Hyperboreans pay dearly."

11013004.ContentTC: “這很好辦。交給阿瓦爾，他這次負責兩支先遣分隊的調度，那群蠢貨都很聽他話。”
11013004.Subtitle: "Easy. Leave it to Avar. He'll be commanding two vanguard squads in the operation. Those fools always listen to him."

11013005.ContentTC: “你們提前把機關備好，阿瓦爾自會拖延他們的進攻速度，讓那些家夥都交代在這兒。”
11013005.Subtitle: "Avar will hold off their assault. Use this time to lay traps and fortify our defences. The fortress will become their graveyard."

11013006.ContentTC: “很快，我們就會從報紙上看到這樣的新聞——”
11013006.Subtitle: "We'll soon read this headline in the news—"

11013007.ContentTC: “『龍莎戰役中，十三軍團為了保衛吾皇神聖的土地浴血奮戰，先遣隊超過九成士官在這場戰役中陣亡。』”
11013007.Subtitle: "'During the battle in Lonza Fortress, the 13th Legion valiantly defended the Emperor's lands. The vanguard suffered ninety percent casualties in the fierce conflict...'"

11013008.ContentTC: “幸存的阿瓦爾中校對這些戰士的亡故表示悼念，並致以無上光榮的褒獎。”
11013008.Subtitle: "'Lieutenant Colonel Avar, one of the survivors, mourned the fallen and delivered a eulogy of unmatched honour.'"

11013009.ContentTC: “好個阿瓦爾！就按你們說的辦吧。只可惜這樣的哀榮便宜了這群豬玀。”
11013009.Subtitle: "Good for Avar! Let's go with this plan then. Shame those dead dogs will receive posthumous honours, though."

11013101.ContentTC: “海伯利亞的暴虐，我等卡戎之民早已不堪忍受。”
11013101.Subtitle: "Charons like us can no longer stand Hyperborean tyranny."

11013102.ContentTC: “我會向神棄者同盟獻上自己的忠誠，這是帝國應得的懲罰。”
11013102.Subtitle: "I hereby pledge my allegiance to The Forsakens. The Empire must be held accountable for its actions."

11013202.Content: 我刚刚检修了通往中控室的升降机，发现升降机的零件遭到了破坏，需要备用零件才能启动。

11013203.Content: 阿瓦尔长官受了伤在休息，莱昂在看管那个疯女人。得麻烦你一下，帮我一起找一下备用零件。

11013205.Content: 多谢队长。加上我找到的这些，应该已经够了。

11013206.Content: 请稍等，我去修一下升降机。

11013403.ContentTC: 尊敬的阿瓦爾·赫德蘭中校，下午好！海伯利亞軍團箴言第十六條：當敵人在你的射程內，別忘了你也在敵人的射程內。
11013403.Subtitle: Good afternoon, Lieutenant Colonel Avar Hrodland! Motto 16 of the Hyperborean Legion: When you have the enemy within range, beware that you are also within theirs...

11013405.ContentTC: 嗨，打了半輩子仗了，頭一次這麽汗流浹背的！哈哈，我還擔心再也見不到達芙涅和克勞迪婭了。
11013405.Subtitle: Whew, of all the battles I've fought, none has been as nerve-wracking as this! Ha, I thought I might never see Daphne and Claudia again.

11013406.ContentTC: 奇怪，已經拿到操作權限了，這開門按鈕還是沒有反應。你那邊怎麽樣了，有沒有什麽不對勁的？
11013406.Subtitle: Strange. I've got the operational clearance… How come it's not working? What about you? Found anything unusual?

11013407.ContentTC: 嗯？你怎麽了，臉色這麽難看。
11013407.Subtitle: Hmm? You look like you've seen a ghost. What's wrong?

11013409.ContentTC: （這份錄音，這份文件……以及眼前的阿瓦爾·赫德蘭，曾經教授我體術和戰鬥技巧，和我一起一步步走到這裡的老師。）
11013409.Subtitle: (The recording, the signed document... and this man in front of me — my mentor on hand-to-hand combat and battle tactics, my superior who always looks out for me...)

11013412.ContentTC: 我找到了這個錄音設備……以及這份文件。
11013412.Subtitle: I found this voice recorder... and this document.

11013415.ContentTC: 你手裏拿著的是什麽？給我看看。
11013415.Subtitle: What's in your hand? Show me.

11013417.ContentTC: 有什麽機密是連我都不能看的？拿來。
11013417.Subtitle: What is it that you have to keep secret from me? Hand it over.

11013420.ContentTC: <W>還有人想要你的命，那家夥就藏在你們軍團的人之中。</>
11013420.Subtitle: Someone in your Legion wants you dead.

11013421.ContentTC: （……那個女人，卡嘉，說過這樣的話……）
11013421.Subtitle: (...That girl, Katya, told me this...)

11013422.ContentTC: （中央控製室的錄音和文件、卡嘉最後的話……以及眼前的阿瓦爾·赫德蘭，曾經教授我體術和戰鬥技巧，和我一起一步步走到這裏的老師。）
11013422.Subtitle: (The recording, the signed document, Katya's words... and this man in front of me — my mentor on hand-to-hand combat and battle tactics, my superior who always looks out for me...)

11013501.Subtitle: We need to have a SERIOUS discussion about this.

11013602.ContentTC: 這些偽證都是你搞出來的吧？我還以為你們這些元老院貴族不會染指這種下三濫的招數，看來是我看走眼了。
11013602.Subtitle: You fabricated all this "evidence," didn't you? I didn't know you old-line aristocrats would stoop to such nasty tricks.

11013603.ContentTC: 我和那些老頑固不一樣，對實用主義者來說，辦法能用就行。
11013603.Subtitle: I'm nothing like those stubborn old fools. I'm a pragmatist and would do anything that works.

11013604.ContentTC: 這——不是那個你很得意的學生嗎？你做的？
11013604.Subtitle: Isn't this your favourite protege? You did this?

11013605.ContentTC: 呵，因為我想和你談筆交易。這裡的事只有我們兩個知道，不需要第三雙耳朵。
11013605.Subtitle: Heh, I was just setting the stage for a deal with you. I don't think we need a third person for this.

11013607.ContentTC: 出去吧，法露茜。沒事，現在整座要塞都在我們手裡——他不敢動手。
11013607.Subtitle: Off you go, Falsi. It's alright, the entire fortress is in our hands. This old man dares not make a move.

11013608.Subtitle: Yes, sir. I shall wait outside the door.

11013609.ContentTC: 先說說你為什麽用那些偽證栽贓我吧。你當上面都是傻子？
11013609.Subtitle: Now, why bother making up all this false evidence? You really think the higher-ups are that stupid?

11013610.ContentTC: 就是因為上面有很多聰明人，他們才一定會裝傻。阿瓦爾，動動你的腦子。既然我敢把事做絕，自然有想要我做絕的人。
11013610.Subtitle: Of course not. They're actually smart enough to turn a blind eye and play along. Use your head, Avar. Why do you think I dare to make this bold move? It's naturally because someone wants me to.

11013611.ContentTC: 反正你已經是個死人了，那麽我就再寬仁一次，讓你死得明白一點吧。
11013611.Subtitle: Since you're a goner already, I'll show some mercy so you won't die a fool.

11013612.ContentTC: 陛下即位之初——也就是塞維烏斯公爵擔任攝政的那段時間裡——他們偏離了海伯利亞長久以來的規則，為帝國這棵大樹嫁接了太多無用的枝葉。
11013612.Subtitle: When His Majesty was first crowned, Duke Servius was our Imperial Regent. But the Regency strayed from established Hyperborean traditions and grafted too many useless scions onto the great Imperial oak.

11013613.ContentTC: 他們竟然允許卡戎之民進入樞密院和軍團，甚至擔任要職——比如你。這太荒謬了。
11013613.Subtitle: Those fools allowed Charons into the Military Council and the Legion, and even appointed a few — like you — into high offices. This is ridiculous.

11013614.ContentTC: 盡管如今陛下已經迷途知返，但這些糜爛的枝葉依舊存在。而我要做的，則是幫陛下一把，將這些糜爛徹底剪除。
11013614.Subtitle: Though His Majesty is now aware of these mistakes, they continue to plague us. I'm merely helping him prune the oak.

11013615.ContentTC: ……鬧了半天，你是看不慣我是個卡戎之民啊。
11013615.Subtitle: ...So you went through all the trouble, just because you don't like Charons?

11013616.ContentTC: 那你早說，用不著上來就做這麽絕吧？只要你放我從這裡活著出去，我就想個辦法早日退休，再也不擋你的路。
11013616.Subtitle: You should've told me earlier. There's no need for such an elaborate ruse. Just let me off this time, and I'll retire early and stay out of your way forever.

11013617.ContentTC: 如果你想要我為你效忠，也可以。只要把這次泄露作戰情報的責任都推到{性别2:他|她}身上就行了。你我不但能全身而退，還能得一份揪出間諜的功勞。並且……
11013617.Subtitle: If you need my loyalty, I can do that too. We can blame {性别2:him|her} for leaking our battle plans. Both of us walk away clean. Hell, we might even get a reward for uncovering a spy. And...

11013618.ContentTC: 並且，你會多一條聽話的狗。
11013618.Subtitle: You'll gain an old dog obedient enough to follow your orders.

11013619.ContentTC: 哈，想不到你也挺下三濫的。不過，你也就只能想到這一步了。阿瓦爾，你以為你活著的那點用處，能比得上死了的你嗎？
11013619.Subtitle: Hah, how quaint, Avar — didn't expect you to stoop this low too. But you don't know the half of it, Avar. You're worth far more to us dead than alive.

11013620.ContentTC: 動動你的腦子吧！如果全帝國都知道一個卡戎軍官背棄軍團，投靠神棄者同盟，害得一批帝國最年輕勇敢的精銳殞命——會發生什麽？
11013620.Subtitle: Use your head! Imagine the uproar if it came out that a high-ranking Charon officer defected and joined The Forsakens, resulting in the deaths of many of our best young soldiers.

11013621.ContentTC: 高層中的卡戎之民本就飽受爭議，屆時他們還能留在現在的位子上？比如我們那位敬愛的長官——你知道有多少雙眼睛在盯著她，等著看她如何跌得粉身碎骨嗎？
11013621.Subtitle: High-ranking Charons are already a thorn in many's flesh. Such a scandal will discredit them. Take our beloved superior — do you know how many people wish to see her crash and burn?

11013622.ContentTC: 西比爾？你想把她趕下去……你的目標是“軍團長”？
11013622.Subtitle: You mean Sibylle? You wish her gone... You're after her position and power?

11013623.ContentTC: 也許吧，也許還有更多。不過，對你來說，都不重要了。
11013623.Subtitle: Perhaps. Maybe I want more. But that's no longer your concern.

11013625.ContentTC: 我們來談談另一件事吧……<H>“零號”</>。
11013625.Subtitle: We should talk about one more thing... About No. 0.

11013627.ContentTC: 她是十三軍團最寶貝的兵刃。如今西比爾雖然得到了她，但想要完成<H>“第二新枝”計劃</>，還少了最關鍵的<H>“觸媒”</>……
11013627.Subtitle: She is the most precious weapon of the 13th Legion. Sibylle controls her now, but to complete the Second Scion Program, she still needs the crucial "Catalyst"...

11013628.ContentTC: 西比爾命你在弗萊格桑省搜尋“觸媒”，但好像過程不怎麽順利啊。
11013628.Subtitle: Sibylle has ordered you to find the Catalyst in Flagson. But your search doesn't seem to be enjoying much success.

11013630.ContentTC: 富爾維斯，成為軍團長的道路不止一條。就算你真靠演這一出趕走西比爾，你能保證陛下就一定會任命你接替她嗎？
11013630.Subtitle: There are many paths to power, Fulvis. Even if this charade pushes Sibylle off her seat, how can you be sure the Emperor will let you take her place?

11013631.ContentTC: 真正能推你到那個位子的，是一份無可替代的“功勞”。
11013631.Subtitle: You need some kind of unparalleled credit to propel you to the Legion's head.

11013633.ContentTC: “第二新枝”計劃對帝國來說太重要了，勝過一百個龍莎要塞。如果你找到“觸媒”，完成計劃的最後一塊拼圖，那時整個帝都都會高呼你的名字——安東尼·富爾維斯。
11013633.Subtitle: The Second Scion Program is too important to the Empire. It's worth far more than a hundred Lonza Fortresses combined. If you find the "Catalyst," which is the final piece of the puzzle, the entire capital will chant your name — Antonius Fulvis.

11013634.ContentTC: 這對你來說正是無可替代的功勞。而我之前碰巧在機緣巧合之下，知道了它的下落。現在，我願意將這份功勞讓給你。
11013634.Subtitle: It's the unparalleled credit you need. And I, by circumstance and chance, happen to know of its whereabouts. I am willing to concede this to you.

11013636.ContentTC: 這便是我的“交易”。我需要你的承諾——放我和外面那些先遣小隊的士兵一條生路。他們中有我的親生女兒，我必須這麽做。
11013636.Subtitle: That would be my end of the deal. All I ask in return is for you to spare me and my troops — my daughter is among them, so I have to make sure they're safe.

11013637.ContentTC: 好感人的父女情！好吧，就在此地、此刻，告訴我“觸媒”的下落，別耍任何花招，你沒有談判的條件。
11013637.Subtitle: What a loving father! Alright, tell me where the "Catalyst" is, here and now, and don't try to pull any tricks — you don't have leverage.

11013639.ContentTC: 嗯，我知道了。接下來，只要……
11013639.Subtitle: Oh, thanks. As for now, I just need one last thing...

11013701.ContentTC: 阿瓦爾，別太信任一個實用主義者。
11013701.Subtitle: Remember, Avar, never trust a pragmatist.

11013702.ContentTC: 法露茜，你留下，處理幹凈。
11013702.Subtitle: Stay behind, Falsi. Clean up this mess.

11013705.ContentTC: ……小型錄音設備……{性别2:他|她}還帶了這個？
11013705.Subtitle: ...A mini recording device...? Why would {性别2:he|she} have this?

11013706.ContentTC: 尊敬的阿瓦爾·赫德蘭中校，您尚未輸入指令。海伯利亞軍團箴言第十七條：服從命令，信任戰友，才會在戰場上活得更久。
11013706.Subtitle: Lieutenant Colonel Avar Hrodland, you have yet to enter any command. Motto 17 of the Hyperborean Legion: Obeying orders and trusting your comrades give you a better chance of survival on the battlefield.

11013801.Subtitle: ...Do not indulge in the eternal void...

11013803.ContentTC: <W>……在鮮血化為奔流的河之前……一切遠未結束……</>
11013803.Subtitle: ...Before blood flows like swollen rivers... This is far from over...

11014001.ContentTC: （阿瓦爾已經沒有任何生命跡象。他身上除了尋常的軍刀、戰術手電、損壞的通訊器外，什麽都沒有。）
11014001.Subtitle: (Avar shows no sign of life. There is nothing on him except for a military knife, a tactical flashlight, and a broken radio.)

11014005.ContentTC: 龍莎要塞全體十三軍團士兵聽令。現通緝前“獅鷲”小隊醫務員、神棄者同盟間諜達芙涅·塞奧多爾。
11014005.Subtitle: Attention to all 13th Legion soldiers in Lonza Fortress. Daphne Theodore, the former Medic of Squad Griffins, is now classified as a Forsakens spy.

11014006.ContentTC: 任何人發現達芙涅·塞奧多爾，即刻處決。
11014006.Subtitle: Daphne Theodore is to be executed upon sight.

11014008.Subtitle: (I must... get out of here first!)

11014101.Subtitle: She's got an accomplice! Kill 'em both!

11014201.ContentTC: 這是麻醉劑，足夠撐一會兒。
11014201.Subtitle: Here, take this painkiller. It should hold you over for a while.

11014203.ContentTC: 中央控製室。父……阿瓦爾長官，還在那裡。
11014203.Subtitle: To the central control room. My fa... Commander Avar is still in there.

11014205.ContentTC: 他已經死——他已經不會說話了，不會動了。
11014205.Subtitle: He's d— Sir Avar is no longer with us.

11014206.ContentTC: ……我還沒有確認過。也許他只是受了重傷，這方面我有經驗的……
11014206.Subtitle: ...I have to check on him myself. Maybe he's just heavily wounded... As a medic, I can probably...

11014207.ContentTC: 回來。中央控製室都燒乾淨了。他臨終前要我活著把你帶出去，你連他最後的話都不聽嗎？
11014207.Subtitle: Get back here. They burned down the entire central control room. Sir Avar's final words were for me to bring you safely out of this place. At least respect the man's dying wish.

11014210.ContentTC: 走吧，先離開這兒，找個安全的地方。
11014210.Subtitle: Let's get out of here and find somewhere safe.

11014211.ContentTC: 平安活下來之前，別回頭。
11014211.Subtitle: There's no turning back now. We have to keep moving.

11014303.ContentTC: 要塞裏都是富爾維斯的人，我們只能去下面碰碰運氣。
11014303.Subtitle: The fortress is filled with Fulvis's men. We have to try our luck with the sewer tunnels.

11014305.ContentTC: 要小心這裡的士兵。這裡很可能已經沒有“戰友”，只有“敵人”了。
11014305.Subtitle: Watch out for the soldiers around here. We may no longer have any allies.

11014306.ContentTC: 警告，無通行權限，無通行權限。
11014306.Subtitle: Warning. No access privileges.

11014307.ContentTC: ……他們這麽快就刪除了我們的權限……
11014307.Subtitle: ...They've already revoked our authorizations...

11014310.ContentTC: 打暈他們，用他們的秘鑰開門。
11014310.Subtitle: Knock them out and use their keys to open the door.

11014402.ContentTC: 說實在的，我……我現在腦袋很亂，很亂。
11014402.Subtitle: To be honest... My head's spinning. Everything's a mess.

11014403.ContentTC: 他死了，父……阿瓦爾長官。死了。外邊的士兵，海伯利亞的士兵，要殺掉我。他們說，我是間諜。我不知道……我不知道……
11014403.Subtitle: Fa... Sir Avar's gone. Those Hyperborean soldiers out there are shooting us on sight. They're calling me a spy. But I... I don't understand any of this...

11014404.ContentTC: 我請求您……請求您告訴我……我可以信任您……只要您這麽說，我就會相信。
11014404.Subtitle: Please... I need to know I can trust you... I'll believe whatever you tell me.

11014405.ContentTC: （輕輕擁抱她。告訴她可以信任你。）
11014405.Subtitle: (Hold her gently and reassure her you can be trusted.)

11014406.ContentTC: （她太依賴自己了——讓她靠自己的力量堅強起來。）
11014406.Subtitle: (Tell her she needs to be strong and face reality on her own.)

11014408.ContentTC: 我、我冷靜下來了。抱歉，明明是您受了這麽重的傷……
11014408.Subtitle: I... I've pulled myself together now. Sorry, you're so heavily injured, yet I was there acting like a crying baby...

11014409.ContentTC: 之前您幫我找的藥劑還留有一些。我來為您緊急處理一下傷口。
11014409.Subtitle: I still have some of the medication you found. Let me help with your injuries.

11014410.ContentTC: 先不要走，藥劑生效還需要些時間……我先告訴您外面發生的事吧。
11014410.Subtitle: Let's rest here until the medicine takes effect... I'll explain everything that happened outside.

11014412.ContentTC: 是，一名女性醫務員，達芙涅·塞奧多爾。先遣小隊的傷兵不要命地拖延時間，讓她跑了。
11014412.Subtitle: Yes, ma'am. A female medic named Daphne Theodore. The vanguard squads fought back fiercely, allowing her to escape.

11014413.ContentTC: 現在「一角鯨」分隊已經開始陸續進入要塞，但清理先遣小隊的事不能讓我們之外的人知道。一旦達芙涅向他們求助，事情就難辦了。
11014413.Subtitle: The Narwhals are entering the fortress. But no one else must know that we cleaned up the vanguards. The situation may turn for the worse if Daphne contacts them for help.

11014414.ContentTC: 而且，因為戰局不順，西比爾軍團長也在趕來龍莎要塞的路上。情況現在有些棘手，不過好在最關鍵的阿瓦爾已經死了。
11014414.Subtitle: The situation is delicate. Chief Sibylle is en route to Lonza Fortress after hearing the battle has turned. Luckily, Avar is already out of the picture.

11014415.ContentTC: 至於達芙涅這個人，您的意思是……
11014415.Subtitle: As for Daphne, what do you want us to do with her...?

11014416.ContentTC: 傳富爾維斯指揮官的命令下去，要塞全面戒嚴，搜尋並處決達芙涅·塞奧多爾。理由……一樣吧，「勾結神棄者同盟，以間諜身份潛入軍團，擾亂要塞進攻計劃」。
11014416.Subtitle: Relay Commander Fulvis's order: lock down the fortress, find, and eliminate Daphne Theodore. As for the charges… claim she conspired with The Forsakens, infiltrated the Legion as a spy, and compromised the fortress assault.

11014419.ContentTC: 我一邊一路上確認分隊同伴們的狀況，一邊往中央控製室的方向走。還算幸運——這一路我躲過了所有士兵。
11014419.Subtitle: I checked on our squad mates while making my way to the central control room. Luckily, I avoided all the soldiers.

11014420.ContentTC: 但無論我怎麽救治，同伴們都回不來了。他們身上的傷大多都是一擊致命——多諷刺啊……最完美無缺的射擊，不是來自敵人，而是來自自己人的子彈！
11014420.Subtitle: But it was too late for most. They all suffered precise, fatal shots — ironically from our own men rather than the enemies.

11014421.ContentTC: 這就是我知道的全部了……現在，輪到您告訴我了，中央控製室裏發生了什麽？
11014421.Subtitle: That's all I know... Now, tell me what happened in the central control room.

11014422.ContentTC: 我會告訴你，但現在還不行。
11014422.Subtitle: I'll explain later, now isn't the right time.

11014423.ContentTC: 不過你的判斷都是正確的，現在這座要塞裏所有的士兵都是敵人。他們受富爾維斯的命令，要殺我們滅口。
11014423.Subtitle: But you were right about the situation — every soldier in this fortress is now our enemy. Fulvis has ordered them to eliminate us.

11014424.ContentTC: 富爾維斯……才是那個將計劃泄露給神棄者同盟，害我們傷亡慘重的叛徒。
11014424.Subtitle: Fulvis... He's the despicable traitor who leaked our plans to The Forsakens. He's the one who decimated our squads.

11014426.ContentTC: 我好得差不多了。謝謝，藥劑很有效。
11014426.Subtitle: Thanks to your medicine, I'm feeling much better.

11014427.ContentTC: 好。既然您現在不願說，那我相信您有您的理由。只是，能不能回答我一個問題？
11014427.Subtitle: Fine. You must have your own reasons for withholding the information. But there's one thing I must know—

11014428.ContentTC: <H>我的父親</>……阿瓦爾他……完成任務了嗎？
11014428.Subtitle: My father... Avar... Did he complete his mission?

11014432.ContentTC: 走吧。只要我們活著，富爾維斯這筆債遲早會討回來。
11014432.Subtitle: Let's go. So long as we're alive, we'll find a chance to make Fulvis pay.

11014501.Content: 我来这儿的路上发现这里到处都是海伯利亚的追兵，我们可以试着从下水道离开。

11014502.Content: 那家伙应该是个小军官，它身上应该有通行权限的钥匙卡！

11014601.ContentTC: 達芙涅·塞奧多爾和不知名同夥躲進了地下水道，現在在1號儲水池附近。
11014601.Subtitle: Daphne Theodore and an unknown accomplice are currently hiding in the sewers near Reservoir 1.

11014602.ContentTC: 向1號儲水池放水，逼他們出來！
11014602.Subtitle: Initiate the flooding of Reservoir 1 to force them out.

11014603.ContentTC: 還是被發現了……我們得在這裏被淹沒之前離開！
11014603.Subtitle: They found us... We need to get out before this section floods completely!

11014701.ContentTC: 當前水位高於預定值，無法開啟安全門，請調整水位後再試。
11014701.Subtitle: Current water level exceeds safety threshold. Safety gate will remain closed. Reduce water level to reopen.

11014702.ContentTC: 進水機關被他們控製了……但這裏既然是儲水池，肯定還有排水機關！
11014702.Subtitle: They're controlling the inlets... But since this is a reservoir, it must also have drainage outlets.

11014802.ContentTC: “快速排水：同時開啟儲水池的三個水閥……”
11014802.Subtitle: "For rapid discharge, activate three reservoir valves simultaneously."

11014803.ContentTC: 他們跑不了多遠！把剩下的穢獸也趕到地下去！
11014803.Subtitle: They can't be far! Herd the remaining Filthoids into the tunnels!

11014804.ContentTC: 封鎖所有地下出口，等叛徒出來，即刻處決。
11014804.Subtitle: Seal all exits. Once they surface, we'll eliminate the traitors.

11014805.ContentTC: 快點，留給我們的時間不多了！
11014805.Subtitle: Hurry up! We're running out of time!

11015002.Content: 再坚持一下，第二个水阀的位置找到了！

11015003.Content: 最后一个……！关闭最后一个水阀后，再去门那儿试试吧？

11015101.Subtitle: We should be safe for now...

11015102.Subtitle: The exit should be up ahead, but...

11015103.ContentTC: 他們肯定在那裡設了埋伏。
11015103.Subtitle: They're definitely waiting to ambush us there.

11015104.ContentTC: 您傷得很重，我們……會有勝算嗎……而且，就算跑出要塞，軍團也不會放過我們……等待我們的，會是無休止的追捕和刺殺……
11015104.Subtitle: You're heavily wounded... Is there any chance of us escaping this place...? Even if we make it out, the Legion will hunt us down... We'll be fugitives forever, constantly dodging assassins...

11015105.ContentTC: 看來只能一輩子住下水道裡了。
11015105.Subtitle: Maybe we should just live in the sewers forever.

11015106.ContentTC: 但這裏食物和衣物都不夠——不對，請您和我一起好好想辦法！
11015106.Subtitle: But this place doesn't have enough food or clothing — Please, let us figure something out!

11015107.ContentTC: 直接出去和他們決一死戰。
11015107.Subtitle: We should just head out and fight to the death.

11015108.ContentTC: 不行……雖然有您在，但以您的傷勢，我們沒有勝算……
11015108.Subtitle: No... You might be a skilled soldier, but you're heavily wounded. We wouldn't stand a chance...

11015110.Subtitle: ...Let's take a deep breath. We'll come up with something.

11015115.ContentTC: 他們以為我死在了中央控製室，不知道現在和你在一起的人是誰，所以他們能確認的目標只有你。
11015115.Subtitle: They think I died in the central control room and they have no idea who your accomplice is. You are the only target they can identify.

11015116.ContentTC: 我扮成你的樣子往外沖，醫務員的製服很醒目，應該可以引開他們。你就想辦法趁亂逃掉。
11015116.Subtitle: I'll wear your uniform and make a run out there. The medic's uniform is conspicuous enough to draw their attention. You'll make your escape during the chaos.

11015117.ContentTC: 您……是在開玩笑嗎？我們的身形根本不一樣，他們很快就會察覺的！
11015117.Subtitle: Are you serious? We're completely different sizes! They'll quickly realise they're chasing the wrong person!

11015118.ContentTC: 能多讓他們慌亂一秒，你就多一秒能逃走的機會。就這樣吧，達芙涅。不要違背老師的遺願。
11015118.Subtitle: The longer I can distract them, the better your chances. This is the plan, Daphne. Honour Sir Avar's last wishes.

11015121.ContentTC: 謝謝您記住父親的願望。
11015121.Subtitle: Thank you for respecting my father's wish.

11015122.ContentTC: 但能請您聽一聽，<H>我的願望</>嗎？
11015122.Subtitle: But could you at least hear my wishes?

11015123.ContentTC: 迪斯瑪尼亞常常會下雨。在我很小的時候，我的玩伴們都很討厭下雨，因為雨會打濕漂亮的頭發，弄臟乾淨的新裙子。
11015123.Subtitle: Dismania is a rainy place. When I was a little girl, all my friends hated the rain because it would mess with their hair and soil their pretty dresses.

11015124.ContentTC: 但我不討厭。因為雨從來不會落到我的肩頭。我看到的雨，只是靴子下一圈圈的小水花，傘尖墜落的一串串露滴。
11015124.Subtitle: But I didn't hate the rain, because it never reached my shoulders. In my eyes, the rain was just little ripples sprouting around my boots and droplets dripping off the brolly.

11015125.ContentTC: 但是長大一點之後，我知道了，我並沒有那麽喜歡下雨。只是因為當時爸爸在，所以所有的雨，都落在了他的那一邊。
11015125.Subtitle: But as I grew older, I realised that rain wasn't that nice. It used to look nice, only because my dad was there to bear it for me.

11015126.ContentTC: 爸爸啊，是一個很好很好的人，也是一個很倔很倔的人。他永遠都在為了別人不顧自己，永遠都是。
11015126.Subtitle: My dad is such a kind man, and such a stubborn one too. He always put others first. Always.

11015128.ContentTC: 我出生前，他為了能夠“配得上”媽媽而加入軍團，出生入死；我長大後，他又為了“不耽誤我的前程”而離開我和媽媽。
11015128.Subtitle: Before I was born, he joined the Legion and fought hard to prove himself worthy of my mom. After I grew up, he left us because he didn't want to "soil my future."

11015129.ContentTC: ……在大街上，他板著臉讓我不要喊他爸爸。在深夜的酒館裡，他喊著我和媽媽的名字，一邊喝得酩酊大醉，一邊流淚——多麽偉大的父親，總是一個人抗下一切……
11015129.Subtitle: ...In public, he'd scowl and forbid me to call him Dad. But deep in the night, he'd drunkenly shout mine and my mother's name, crying — He was always bearing the weight of everything on his own...

11015130.ContentTC: 可是，他從來都沒有問過我，這一切到底是不是我想要的……就像此刻的您，也從來沒有問過我，我是否想要踏著您的生命活下去！
11015130.Subtitle: But he never asked if I wanted any of this... Just like you never asked if I wanted to live knowing you sacrificed yourself for me!

11015131.ContentTC: 您與他都不知道……我想要的，從來都不是一個用自己的身軀為我遮擋風雨的人。我真正的願望是……
11015131.Subtitle: Neither of you know what I actually wanted... I never wished for a hero who'd shield me from the rain. My wish is that...

11015132.ContentTC: 如果遮風擋雨的傘小到只能庇護一人，請讓我和你們一起走進雨裡。
11015132.Subtitle: If there's only room for one under the brolly, I'll brave the rain with you all.

11015133.ContentTC: 我，想要的是，<H>和您一起</>活下去。
11015133.Subtitle: I wish that we make it out and live on, together.

11015135.ContentTC: 我們再一起想想吧……一定有辦法，一定還有辦法的！
11015135.Subtitle: Let's think together… There has to be another way!

11015136.ContentTC: 現在的情況是，富爾維斯要滅我們的口，他的手段是給我們扣上間諜的帽子，借軍團同僚的手誅殺我們……
11015136.Subtitle: Fulvis wants us silenced. That's our situation. He's labelled us as spies so that our fellow soldiers would kill us for him...

11015137.ContentTC: “獅鷲”、“雪狼”兩支先遣小隊僅剩我們二人，整座要塞的士兵全受富爾維斯和他的副官法露茜調遣……整座要塞的士兵……
11015137.Subtitle: We're the only ones left from the Griffins and Snow Wolves. Every soldier here follows Fulvis and his adjutant Falsi... Every soldier in the fortress...

11015138.ContentTC: 等等，我想到了……！父親和我講過，“以退為進，險中求勝”……
11015138.Subtitle: Wait, I have an idea...! Father once said a strategic retreat could be a cover for an advance. Sometimes the greatest risks lead to victory.

11015139.ContentTC: 我們還有一個選擇……“自投羅網”。
11015139.Subtitle: We still have one option... We can turn ourselves in.

11015140.Subtitle: You want to surrender to Fulvis?

11015141.ContentTC: 不，不是富爾維斯，而是<H>另一個人</>……
11015141.Subtitle: No, not to Fulvis. To someone else...

11015142.Subtitle: Turn ourselves in... to someone else?

11015145.ContentTC: 你還記不記得，法露茜說過這樣的話？
11015145.Subtitle: Remember what Falsi said in the broadcast?

11015146.ContentTC: 封鎖所有地下出口，等叛徒出來，即刻處決。
11015146.Subtitle: Seal all exits. Once they surface, we'll eliminate the traitors.

11015147.ContentTC: 快點，留給我們的時間不多了！
11015147.Subtitle: Hurry up! We're running out of time!

11015148.ContentTC: 現在龍莎要塞完全在富爾維斯的手裡，抓到我們是遲早的事，法露茜究竟在為什麽而慌張？
11015148.Subtitle: Lonza Fortress is currently under Fulvis's full control. We're little more than rats in a cage. Then why is Falsi in such a hurry?

11015149.ContentTC: 而在那之前，您還記不記得我提到過，我偷聽到一位士兵說——
11015149.Subtitle: Do you remember what I overheard earlier from one of the soldiers—

11015150.ContentTC: 因為戰局不順，西比爾軍團長也在趕來龍莎要塞的路上。
11015150.Subtitle: Chief Sibylle is en route to Lonza Fortress after hearing the battle has turned.

11015151.ContentTC: ……你的意思是，你想找到西比爾，請求她的庇護。
11015151.Subtitle: ...So you want to seek protection from Sibylle?

11015153.ContentTC: 但是富爾維斯已經給我們安排了罪名，甚至準備好了偽證……等一下，我明白你的“自投羅網”了。
11015153.Subtitle: But Fulvis has already condemned us and even fabricated evidence... Wait, I get why you want to turn ourselves in.

11015154.ContentTC: 嗯！西比爾軍團長也是煉金院出身，以我對她的了解，她不會容忍任何叛徒——即使是最親近的人。
11015154.Subtitle: Mm-hmm! Chief Sibylle is also a graduate of the Academy. From what I know of her, she wouldn't tolerate betrayal from anyone, not even those she holds dear.

11015155.ContentTC: ……但也因此，她一定會慎重審問，不會讓嫌犯輕易沒命，以至斷掉線索。
11015155.Subtitle: ...Which is also why Sibylle would carefully review any acts of treason. She would not make any hasty decisions to execute the suspects because she'd want to get to the bottom of it.

11015156.ContentTC: 如果我們能見到她，最大的可能，我們會被投入軍事監獄。聽聞那裡壁壘森嚴，連一只鳥兒都飛不出來；但也因此，一切想要對我們滅口的危險，也都進不去。
11015156.Subtitle: If we manage to meet her, she's most likely to throw us into the Imperial Prison. The Prison is reputedly so well guarded that even a fly could not escape the place. But it'll also keep out anyone who wishes to silence us.

11015157.ContentTC: 那裏反而變成了最安全的地方。而在審問中證明自己無罪，是我們唯一活下去的機會。
11015157.Subtitle: The Imperial Prison will be our safest refuge. We can prove our innocence during interrogations. This is our only chance to survive.

11015158.ContentTC: 只是要委屈一下您，因間諜罪接受審查，必然會有損您的名譽……但是，只要我們挺過審訊，就能還自己清白，讓真正的罪人伏誅。
11015158.Subtitle: Your reputation will suffer though, as you'll be interrogated for espionage... But once we endure the questioning, we will be able to clear our names and bring the real traitors to justice.

11015159.ContentTC: ……因間諜罪接受審查……這件事有沒有可能傳到軍團外面去，比如皇室？
11015159.Subtitle: ...Being questioned for espionage... Any chance that word gets out beyond the Legion? Perhaps the royal family will hear of this?

11015160.ContentTC: 尤裏烏斯陛下一向極為重視軍事，十三軍團又是他親自建立的，我想會的……
11015160.Subtitle: The army has always been the focus of Emperor Julius. Moreover, His Majesty personally founded the 13th Legion. I believe it will reach his ears...

11015161.ContentTC: ……這麽說來，或許<H>那個人</>也能幫上忙。
11015161.Subtitle: Then perhaps... that person can help us.

11015162.ContentTC: 好，按你說的辦吧。我們去找西比爾。
11015162.Subtitle: Alrigh, let's go with your plan and find Sibylle.

11015201.ContentTC: 於是，我牽起了她的手，朝著透過門縫的那一隙陽光走去。
11015201.Subtitle: And thus, I took her hand and we stepped towards that narrow beam of sunlight piercing through the door's gap.

11015202.ContentTC: 就像是，正踏入一座光輝璀璨的墳墓——
11015202.Subtitle: It felt as though we were stepping into a shimmering grave of our own making...

11015203.ContentTC: 我們用盡最後的力氣甩開追兵，一路找到剛抵達要塞的西比爾軍團長。
11015203.Subtitle: We expended our last ounces of strength evading our pursuers, in time to meet Chief Sibylle, who had just arrived at the fortress.

11015204.ContentTC: 再後來，正如達芙涅猜測的那樣，我們被押送到了這裡。
11015204.Subtitle: And just as Daphne had predicted, we were escorted to this very place.

11015301.ContentTC: 精彩的故事，和現場“一角鯨”士兵的證詞完全相反。既然你主張你和阿瓦爾·赫德蘭無罪，那麽——
11015301.Subtitle: What a riveting story, which completely contradicts the testimonies provided by the Narwhals. Since you claim that you and Avar Hrodland are innocent—

11015302.ContentTC: 說說這些證物吧。為什麽現場發現的那份給神棄者同盟的投誠信，除字跡一致外，紙張上的痕跡與阿瓦爾本人的戰術手套磨損狀況也完全一致？
11015302.Subtitle: Let's talk about the evidence then. How come the letter pledging allegiance to The Forsakens not only bears Avar's handwriting, but also shows faint marks aligning perfectly with the worn parts on Avar's glove?

11015303.ContentTC: 是為了栽贓。真兇之所以一定要阿瓦爾進入中央控製室，就是為了要他本人拿到這份文件，留下他的指紋或手套印記。至於字跡，他人更是可以模仿。
11015303.Subtitle: It was a setup. The real culprit lured Avar into the central control room so that Avar would find the letter and accidentally leave the unique marks of his glove on it when he was holding it. As for the handwriting, it could be faked by others.

11015304.ContentTC: 陣亡士兵的屍檢報告中多有要塞機關所傷的痕跡，而龍莎要塞中央控製室的操作臺，只留有阿瓦爾·赫德蘭一人的操作記錄。你怎麽解釋？
11015304.Subtitle: The forensic reports on the fallen soldiers indicate numerous wounds inflicted by the fortress's own defense systems, and only Avar Hrodland's name appears in the operation log of the central control room. How do you explain that?

11015305.ContentTC: 阿瓦爾長官接管要塞的操作權限，不是為了開啟機關，而是為了關停機關。
11015305.Subtitle: Commander Avar did not use his control to activate the defense systems — instead, he attempted to shut them down.

11015306.ContentTC: 至於操作記錄，如果現場有某位軍官的操作權限比阿瓦爾更高，那麽他完全有機會刪除自己的操作記錄。
11015306.Subtitle: As for the operation log, any officer with higher clearance than Sir Avar could easily manipulate the records to remove traces of their involvement.

11015307.Subtitle: ...Do you have any idea what you just said?

11015308.ContentTC: 我清楚。我正式指控安東尼·富爾維斯，他是龍莎要塞一案真正的幕後黑手。
11015308.Subtitle: I absolutely do. I'm formally accusing Antonius Fulvis of orchestrating the events at Lonza Fortress.

11015309.ContentTC: 那你知不知道，如果你對富爾維斯上校的指控不實，你將面臨什麽刑罰？
11015309.Subtitle: Then are you aware of the consequences if your accusation against Colonel Fulvis are proven false?

11015310.Subtitle: ...It's ten years in prison, for making false accusations.

11015311.ContentTC: 回答錯誤，是叛國罪、間諜罪和誣陷罪。
11015311.Subtitle: Incorrect. You'll be charged with treason, espionage, and making false accusations.

11015312.ContentTC: 你會被處以帝國的最高極刑——以荊棘藤條倒懸著釘在迪斯瑪尼亞市中心的天之樹上公開行刑，直至咽氣。
11015312.Subtitle: And the highest penalty in the Empire awaits you: being hung upside down with thorny vines and crucified on the Heaventree in the centre of Dismania, until your very last breath is taken.

11015313.ContentTC: 我說的全部都是事實。既然你們選擇對我和達芙涅·塞奧多爾分開審訊，就應該知道，我們的證詞完全可以互證。
11015313.Subtitle: I'm telling the truth. Since you have chosen to interrogate me and Daphne Theodore separately, you must be aware that our testimonies can perfectly corroborate each other.

11015314.ContentTC: 你本來就受了不輕的傷，又挨了刑訊，還能硬撐著不改口，勇氣可嘉。
11015314.Subtitle: Despite suffering grievous wounds, you have endured intense interrogation without changing your testimonies. Admirable, I must say.

11015315.ContentTC: 審訊官，準備新的審訊——用“煉火之獄”。
11015315.Subtitle: Push the interrogation to the next level — initiate the "Inferno."

11015316.ContentTC: 是。催眠針劑已經準備完畢。
11015316.Subtitle: Yes, ma'am. The hypnotic agent is ready.

11015317.ContentTC: 如果你還能挺過這次審問，我就考慮認可你證言的價值。
11015317.Subtitle: Survive this, and I'll consider the veracity of your testimony.

11015402.ContentTC: 剛剛，應該是典獄長在說……“審訊”……
11015402.Subtitle: The warden just said... the next-level "interrogation"...

11015403.ContentTC: 等等，那兩個人是——！萊昂和……馬爾科？！
11015403.Subtitle: Wait, isn't that Leon… and Marco!?

11015405.ContentTC: 若你堅稱自己是無辜的，就向我證明你的正義吧。
11015405.Subtitle: If you claim to be innocent, prove it to me.

11015502.ContentTC: 如審判長大人所見，我們的作戰計劃全被泄露了……
11015502.Subtitle: As you can see, ma'am, all our plans have been leaked...

11015503.ContentTC: ……阿瓦爾長官參與了先遣隊作戰計劃的擬定……
11015503.Subtitle: ...Commander Avar participated in the formulation of the vanguard squad's combat plan...

11015504.ContentTC: ……我想，身為卡戎之民的他，是最可能向神棄者同盟泄露計劃的人……
11015504.Subtitle: ...He's a Charon. He was the one most likely to reveal our plans to The Forsakens...

11015602.ContentTC: ……神棄者同盟在每一條路上都設置了陷阱……
11015602.Subtitle: ...The Forsakens set traps in every path...

11015603.ContentTC: 如審判長大人所見，有人……背叛了我們……
11015603.Subtitle: As you can see, ma'am, someone... betrayed us...

11015701.ContentTC: 那位審訊官提到了“催眠藥劑”……
11015701.Subtitle: That interrogator mentioned a hypnotic agent...

11015702.ContentTC: 這裏……應該不是真實的世界。我想我現在在夢中。
11015702.Subtitle: I'm probably not in a real world. This is a dream...

11015802.ContentTC: 如審判長大人所見，我是龍莎戰役先遣小隊的指揮官阿瓦爾·赫德蘭……
11015802.Subtitle: As you can see, ma'am, I am Avar Hrodland, Commander of the vanguard squads in this mission...

11015803.ContentTC: 我背叛了海伯利亞帝國，背叛了十三軍團……出賣了“獅鷲”、“雪狼”兩支先遣隊……
11015803.Subtitle: I turned my back on the Hyperborean Empire. I betrayed the 13th Legion... I sold out the Griffins and the Snow Wolves...

11015804.ContentTC: 我的協助者是……我和前妻克勞迪婭·塞奧多爾的女兒……達芙涅……以及……我在皇家軍事學院的學生……{nickname2}……
11015804.Subtitle: My accomplices include... my daughter Daphne, from my ex-wife Claudia Theodore... and my protege at the Imperial Military College, ...

11015806.ContentTC: 看來，這就是富爾維斯為我準備的“罪名”了。
11015806.Subtitle: So this is the charge Fulvis had prepared for me.

11015807.ContentTC: 閉嘴。別用他的樣子說話。
11015807.Subtitle: Shut up. You're not him.

11015901.ContentTC: 如審判長大人所見，我是阿瓦爾·赫德蘭的女兒，達芙涅·塞奧多爾……
11015901.Subtitle: As you can see, ma'am, I am Daphne Theodore, daughter of Avar Hrodland...

11015902.ContentTC: 我的父親……與{nickname2}……原本計劃平分向同盟出賣情報的報酬……
11015902.Subtitle: My father... and ... they planned to split the payment for selling intel to The Forsakens...

11015903.ContentTC: ……在要塞核心區域……因分贓不均……
11015903.Subtitle: ...But at the heart of the fortress... They disagreed on the division of the spoils...

11015905.Subtitle: He was killed in a ruse woven by  ...

11015906.ContentTC: 在那之後，{性别2:他|她}還欺騙了我……父親死亡的真相……
11015906.Subtitle: {性别2:He|She} then deceived me about how my father died...

11015907.ContentTC: 我將兇手帶到審判長大人面前……懇求審判長大人給予公正的判決……
11015907.Subtitle: I've brought the murderer to you, ma'am... I humbly request you to deliver a fair and just verdict...

11016001.ContentTC: 如審判長大人所見，我是龍莎要塞中央控製室的控製臺……
11016001.Subtitle: As you can see, ma'am, I am the control panel in the central control room of Lonza Fortress...

11016002.ContentTC: 我親眼所見，阿瓦爾·赫德蘭中校與{nickname2}一同進入中央控製室調查……
11016002.Subtitle: I observed Lieutenant Colonel Avar Hrodland and  enter the central control room...

11016003.ContentTC: 中途二人起了沖突……拔槍相向……
11016003.Subtitle: A conflict erupted between them, and weapons were drawn...

11016004.ContentTC: 最終……長官阿瓦爾倒在我面前，只有{nickname2}獨自離開……
11016004.Subtitle: I witnessed the fall of Colonel Avar.  left alone shortly after...

11016005.ContentTC: 海伯利亞軍團箴言第十八條：過於順利的戰況之後，很可能就是敵人的埋伏……
11016005.Subtitle: Motto 18 of the Hyperborean Legion: An unexpectedly easy victory often leads to an impending ambush...

11016006.ContentTC: ……為什麽你在夢裡也要復讀那些箴言啊！
11016006.Subtitle: ...Um, can't believe you have to recite those mottos even in my dreams.

11016101.Subtitle: All verdicts are in the name of justice.

11016102.ContentTC: 你須如實回答所有問題，不得有半分虛假、矯飾或隱瞞。
11016102.Subtitle: All questions must be answered absent falsehood. I tolerate no fabrication, alteration, or concealment of the truth.

11016103.ContentTC: 作為帝國的士兵，你是否背叛了帝國，與神棄者同盟有接觸？
11016103.Subtitle: As an Imperial soldier, have you betrayed your Empire by conspiring with The Forsakens?

11016104.ContentTC: 若你背叛了帝國的正義，就委身於這柄刀下！
11016104.Subtitle: Should you betray the justice of the Empire, this blade shall claim your deceit.

11016201.ContentTC: 龍莎要塞一役中，先遣隊伍全軍覆沒，是否與你有關？
11016201.Subtitle: The vanguard squads were obliterated in the battle of Lonza Fortress. Were you the architect of their doom?

11016202.ContentTC: 好好感受吧！因為某些人的背叛，他們不得不這樣死去！
11016202.Subtitle: Feel their agony! Betrayal led them to untimely deaths.

11016203.ContentTC: 若你背棄了同胞的正義，就被穢獸的利爪撕碎！
11016203.Subtitle: Should you betray the justice of your comrades, these Filthoids' claws shall tear you to pieces!

11016204.ContentTC: （他們就是被這些怪物……富爾維斯……甚至用這樣的怪物來對付自己的同胞……！）
11016204.Subtitle: (They were killed by these monsters... Fulvis... He actually unleashed these monsters upon his own comrades...!)

11016301.ContentTC: 最後一個問題，阿瓦爾·赫德蘭的死亡，是否是你所為？
11016301.Subtitle: One last question. Are you the cause of Avar Hrodland's demise?

11016302.ContentTC: 即使他背叛了帝國，他也一直信任你。他葬身火海中的時候，你在做什麽？
11016302.Subtitle: Despite his faults, he trusted you. Where were you when he was consumed by flames?

11016303.ContentTC: （是的……他<H>的的確確</>那樣信任我……）
11016303.Subtitle: (Yes... He truly trusted me...)

11016304.ContentTC: （在完成復仇之前，我必須活下去……不能讓這個女人殺了我……）
11016304.Subtitle: (I must survive... to avenge him... I cannot let this woman kill me...)

11016305.ContentTC: 若你背棄了同伴的正義，就被這獄火灼燒殆盡！
11016305.Subtitle: Should you betray the loyalty of friendship, these infernal flames shall burn you to ashes!

11016306.ContentTC: （正義……正義……她一直在追求的，正是“正義”……）
11016306.Subtitle: (Justice... justice... That's what she keeps talking about...)

11016307.Subtitle: (Time to reveal the truth of that day...)

11016401.ContentTC: 典獄長大人，為了你心中的正義——
11016401.Subtitle: Ma'am, to satisfy the justice you seek—

11016402.ContentTC: 讓我來告訴你真相吧。那天在中央控製室，全部的“真相”。
11016402.Subtitle: Allow me to tell you the truth... of what unfolded in the central control room that day.

11016502.ContentTC: ……怎麽突然醒了？我正問到最關鍵的部分！
11016502.Subtitle: ...Why did you wake up? My questioning had just reached a pivotal point!

11016503.ContentTC: 沒關系，典獄長大人。我還記得我在夢中對你說了什麽。
11016503.Subtitle: It's alright, ma'am. I remember what I told you in my dreams.

11016504.ContentTC: 我會將那天的真相原原本本地告訴你，也希望你聽過之後，能憑借你心中的那份“正義”做出選擇。
11016504.Subtitle: I'll tell you exactly what happened that day. Once you've heard the truth, I hope the justice within your heart will guide your decision.

11016601.Subtitle: We need to have a *serious* discussion about this.

11016602.ContentTC: 我長話短說。等下，我會用這把槍向你射擊，接下來你就裝死。
11016602.Subtitle: I'll make this short. Later, I'll shoot you with this gun, and you'll have to play dead.

11016603.ContentTC: 為了把戲做足，我會打得更真一點。雖然不是要害，但可能會很疼。你一定要忍住，別出聲。
11016603.Subtitle: To make it convincing enough, the shot will have to hit. It will miss your vitals but will really hurt. You must endure the pain silently.

11016604.Subtitle: What are you going to do?

11016605.ContentTC: 我們被困在這道門裡，外面的通訊全被切斷了。富爾維斯一定就在路上，我們已經沒有時間了。
11016605.Subtitle: We're trapped in here, with all contact to the outside world cut off. Fulvis is already on his way. We are running out of time.

11016606.ContentTC: 死人才不會辯解，富爾維斯一定會要我的命。你和我一起行動，又目睹了他構陷的經過，他想必也不會讓你活著回去。
11016606.Subtitle: Only the dead keep silent forever. Fulvis will definitely kill me. We're both on this mission, and you've seen his fabricated evidence, so he surely won't spare you either.

11016609.ContentTC: ……如果我“殺了你”，假裝借此向他投誠，他就有可能放棄警惕，放過你……這是能讓你活下去的唯一方式了。
11016609.Subtitle: ...If I "kill" you and feign allegiance to him, it'll lower his guard, allowing you to go unnoticed... It's the only way to ensure your survival.

11016610.ContentTC: 不……老師，我們一起殺出去，總會有出路的！
11016610.Subtitle: No, Sir Avar... Let's just fight our way out... There's got to be a way out!

11016611.ContentTC: 你這小鬼，別亂來。我這條命可比你想的寶貴，還有別的用呢。
11016611.Subtitle: Not everything can be solved with a fight, kid. My life has more value than you think — it serves a greater purpose.

11016612.ContentTC: 等會兒我會試著先和富爾維斯談判。當然，多半是談不攏的，所以別抱希望。我去和他談判，只是為了一個重要的東西——
11016612.Subtitle: I'll try to negotiate with Fulvis, though I believe it's going to fail in the end, so don't get your hopes up. The negotiation is for a more important purpose—

11016614.ContentTC: 這是錄音設備，你貼身帶著。它會成為你日後扳倒富爾維斯的鐵證。
11016614.Subtitle: Take this recording device. It'll provide the evidence needed to expose and destroy Fulvis.

11016615.ContentTC: 如果沒有證據，這裡發生的一切都只在你一張嘴上。你沒有任何能對抗富爾維斯的武器。士兵們冤屈的哭號，也將永遠在龍莎的上空徘徊。
11016615.Subtitle: Without it, all you have is your word, which happens to be the most unconvincing evidence. The cries of our fallen comrades will be lost to the winds of Lonza Fortress.

11016617.ContentTC: 別苦著臉，笑一個！戰士哪怕面對千萬發炮彈，也要笑著一步步向前啊。
11016617.Subtitle: Why the long face? Cheer up, kid! A true soldier laughs at adversity.

11016619.ContentTC: ……{nickname2}，我引以為傲的學生啊……抱歉，連累你卷進了這種事。
11016619.Subtitle: I'm proud to have been your instructor, ... And I'm sorry for dragging you into this mess.

11016620.ContentTC: 但你一定要活下去，原原本本地將這裡的真相帶給軍團長，帶給陛下。你要讓全帝國的人知道，這裡的每一個士兵，都為了他們的信條與使命，戰至最後一刻。
11016620.Subtitle: You must survive. Bring the truth to Chief Sibylle and His Majesty. Let the entire Empire know that every soldier here held true to their creed and duty, and everyone fought till their very last breath.

11016701.ContentTC: ……這就是那天在中央控製室發生的事。
11016701.Subtitle: ...That's exactly what happened in the central control room that day.

11016702.ContentTC: 阿瓦爾老師在最後一刻，面對比他強大千萬倍的陰謀和子彈，用自己的生命留下了決定性的證據——這便是他堅守正義的方式。
11016702.Subtitle: Sir Avar fought valiantly, confronting a conspiracy far greater than any individual could withstand alone. He sacrificed his life to secure crucial evidence — his final act in defence of justice.

11016703.ContentTC: 只可惜他還是低估了敵人的縝密。我半昏迷時，隱約感覺到，富爾維斯的副官法露茜帶走了那支錄音設備。
11016703.Subtitle: But, we underestimated the enemy's meticulousness. As I drifted in and out of consciousness, I sensed Fulvis's adjutant, Falsi, removing the recording device from me.

11016704.ContentTC: 醒來後，富爾維斯已經接管了整座要塞，此時和他們硬拼只會讓我和達芙涅送命……真相也將石沈大海。
11016704.Subtitle: By the time I fully regained consciousness, Fulvis had seized control of the fortress. Confronting him would have led to our deaths, and the truth would have been buried with us.

11016705.ContentTC: 所以，我們選擇用這種方式來見你。我相信，以你的手段，一定能得到那份證據，或者至少，得到法露茜的供詞。
11016705.Subtitle: That's why we decided to come to you like this. I believe that you have the authority to recover that evidence, or at least secure a testimony from Falsi.

11016706.ContentTC: 海爾法典獄長，你言必稱正義，我想你應該明白應當怎麽堅守你的正義了。去抓捕法露茜吧，你想要的真相就在那裡。
11016706.Subtitle: Warden Hellfire, I know you hold justice above all else, and I believe you possess the means to defend it. Please, go get Falsi. She holds the truth you want.

11016707.ContentTC: 海伯利亞是一架巨大的機器，它需要能讓每顆螺釘都正確運轉的規律。
11016707.Subtitle: Hyperborea functions like a vast machine, requiring every component to operate flawlessly.

11016708.ContentTC: 我的職責便是保護這條規律，保護海伯利亞訂下的“正義”。如果有人想要利用我的手摧毀這條規律，我便會讓他付出應有的代價。
11016708.Subtitle: My role is to uphold the law and protect the justice defined by Hyperborea. If anyone attempts to manipulate me to subvert this law, they will face severe consequences.

11016709.ContentTC: 我會去調查法露茜。但如果你在用謊言拖延時間，想必你清楚後果。
11016709.Subtitle: I will investigate Falsi. Be aware of the consequences if what you said proves to be false and a waste of my time.

11016801.ContentTC: {nickname2}，海爾法典獄長吩咐了，帶塞奧多爾小姐過來。
11016801.Subtitle: , Warden Hellfire has instructed me to bring Miss Theodore here.

11016802.ContentTC: 審訊的時候，她一直請求見你。
11016802.Subtitle: During her interrogation, she repeatedly requested to see you.

11016805.Subtitle: ...You weren't supposed to know that part...

11016806.ContentTC: 那、那個，我也不知道為什麽，從今天下午開始，審問官突然變溫和了許多，甚至還主問我有什麽特別想實現的心願。
11016806.Subtitle: Well, I don't know what happened, but the interrogator seemed much more accommodating this afternoon. She even asked if I wanted anything.

11016807.ContentTC: 但我的供詞一直都是那些……是您說了什麽，打動了典獄長嗎？
11016807.Subtitle: My testimony hasn't changed... Did you say something that swayed the Warden?

11016808.ContentTC: ……還是說——難道，這是死刑之前最後的憐憫？！
11016808.Subtitle: ...Or is this some sort of final kindness before our execution!?

11016809.ContentTC: 沒錯，我認罪了，我們就要被處決了。
11016809.Subtitle: You're right. I pleaded guilty. We'll be executed soon.

11016810.ContentTC: ……是嗎……我明白了。這也是沒辦法的事，畢竟他們的拷問真的很疼。
11016810.Subtitle: ...Really...? I see. I suppose you had no other choice. No one can withstand such intense interrogation.

11016811.ContentTC: 沒關系的，您已經保護我夠久了。所以，沒關系的。
11016811.Subtitle: It's alright. You've done so much to protect me already...

11016812.Subtitle: It's not true. I was just messing with you...

11016813.ContentTC: 你這個人真是的——嚇死我了……你、你要給我道歉的……
11016813.Subtitle: Wha... You really scared me... Y—You owe me an apology...

11016814.ContentTC: 如果海爾法的調查順利，我想過不了多久我們就能出去了。到時候，請你看場歌劇作為賠禮吧。
11016814.Subtitle: If Warden Hellfire's investigation goes well, we'll be free soon. I'll make it up to you by taking you to the opera house.

11016815.ContentTC: 典獄長相信了我的證詞，她去調查法露茜了。
11016815.Subtitle: The Warden believed what I said and went to investigating Falsi.

11016817.ContentTC: ……你身上又多了好多傷，很痛吧……我、我去求他們把醫藥箱還給我……
11016817.Subtitle: ...You've got a lot more injuries. They must hurt... I... I'll beg them to give me back my first-aid kit...

11016818.ContentTC: 我還好，你先給自己治療一下吧……
11016818.Subtitle: I'm fine. You should take care of your own injuries though...

11016819.ContentTC: ……如果海爾法典獄長的調查順利，我想過不了多久我們就能出去了。
11016819.Subtitle: ...If Warden Hellfire's investigation goes well, we'll be free soon.

11016821.ContentTC: ……還有一件事。抱歉，雖然可能會讓您想起不快的回憶，但我很怕以後再也沒有機會問了。
11016821.Subtitle: ...And one more thing. I'm sorry, this might bring back painful memories, but I must ask while I can.

11016822.ContentTC: 上次在要塞裡，情況危急，您沒有告訴我父親的事。現在我已經整理好了心情，可以請您講給我聽嗎？父親他最後……有沒有留下什麽？
11016822.Subtitle: Back at the fortress, the situation was so desperate that you didn't have time to tell me about my father's death. But I've sorted out my mood. Can you tell me about it now? Did my father... leave anything behind?

11016824.ContentTC: 他留下了這個。這張照片被他藏在貼身口袋裡，最靠近心臟的位置。
11016824.Subtitle: Sir Avar kept this with him at all times, in the pocket closest to his heart.

11016825.ContentTC: 還有一句話，是他最後對我說的——
11016825.Subtitle: He wanted you to have this message—

11016826.ContentTC: “有機會的話，請你找到達芙涅。如果她還活著，帶她一起……逃出去。等安全了，告訴她——
11016826.Subtitle: "Find Daphne if possible. If she's alive, get her out of here... Once you're both safe, tell her—"

11016827.ContentTC: “對不起，我的女兒。其實我一直等著，你再叫我一聲『爸爸』，像小時候一樣。”
11016827.Subtitle: "I'm sorry, my baby girl. I've always wanted to hear you call me Dad again, just like when you were little."

11016829.ContentTC: 明明……我都已經長這麽大了……
11016829.Subtitle: So long that... I'm not the little girl in the photo anymore...

11016830.ContentTC: 好了，達芙涅小姐，你們通過了典獄長的又一次考驗，可以請你先離開了。
11016830.Subtitle: Alright. Both of you have again passed the Warden's test. Miss Daphne, you may leave now.

11016832.ContentTC: 是典獄長的命令。把你們單獨關在一起，監聽你們到底在談些什麽。
11016832.Subtitle: Per the Warden's orders. I was to confine you both here and monitor your interactions.

11016833.ContentTC: “如果是犯人的話，現在很可能在串通口供”……我明白了，謝謝海爾法大人給我們這個自證的機會。
11016833.Subtitle: Right, if we were guilty, we'd make use of every opportunity to collude in our testimonies... I understand. Thank you for giving us a chance to prove our innocence.

11016834.ContentTC: 也許……我們很快就能走出這裡了。
11016834.Subtitle: Perhaps... we'll leave this place soon.

11016903.ContentTC: 上頭加急走完了所有審核流程，到我手裡的，只有一張要你們命的紙。
11016903.Subtitle: A directive to expedite all procedural reviews has been issued from above. The only document I received is a writ demanding your immediate execution.

11016904.ContentTC: 典獄長大人，這不對——這不符合審判的流程！
11016904.Subtitle: Ma'am, this is not right — it goes against the standard procedures of interrogation.

11016905.ContentTC: 看看這份文件吧，最後這串簽名。連最高法務大臣都簽了，西比爾也攔不下。你們真是卷進了了不得的事。
11016905.Subtitle: Take a look at the writ and the signatures at the bottom. Even the Supreme Minister of Justice has signed it. Not even Chief Sibylle can stop it. Your case has grown beyond anyone's control.

11016906.ContentTC: 法露茜呢？只要能找到法露茜，找到那支錄音設備，真相就……！
11016906.Subtitle: What about Falsi? As long as we find Falsi and the recording device, we can prove that...

11016908.ContentTC: 在龍莎一役的一場爆炸中，她不慎跌落到要塞外。士兵們在河岸發現了她染血的配槍。雖然軍團扔在搜尋她的下落，但依照目前推測，她很可能已經死亡。
11016908.Subtitle: An explosion occurred during the battle. Falsi was last seen outside the fortress. Her bloodstained pistol was found along the riverbank. Although the Legion continues to search, it is likely that she is deceased.

11016909.ContentTC: ……典獄長大人，您真的相信這種巧合嗎？
11016909.Subtitle: ...Ma'am, do you really believe in such a coincidence?

11017001.ContentTC: 維吉爾親王殿下！這是審訊犯人的骯臟地方，請您留步！
11017001.Subtitle: Your Royal Highness Prince Vergilius! This place isn't fitting for someone of your stature. Please don't proceed any further!

11017003.ContentTC: 湊齊這麽多簽名，可真不容易。
11017003.Subtitle: Gathering so many signatures must have been quite the feat.

11017004.ContentTC: 可惜這麽多簽名，應該都沒我這個管用吧？
11017004.Subtitle: Yet, these signatures might weigh less than the one in my hand, I suppose?

11017006.ContentTC: 維吉爾殿下，皇室也打算幹涉龍莎間諜案的審判嗎？
11017006.Subtitle: Does the royal family intend to intervene in this military case?

11017007.ContentTC: 典獄長女士，您將陛下親自簽發特赦令一事稱作“幹預”？皇家軍事監獄如今已經不再隸屬“皇家”了嗎？
11017007.Subtitle:
Intervene? I must ask, do you view His Majesty's decree of pardon as an "intervention"?\
Is the Royal Military Prison no longer under the crown's jurisdiction?

11017009.ContentTC: 我要和{nickname2}單獨會面，無關人等出去。
11017009.Subtitle: I need to speak with  alone. Everyone else may leave.

11017101.ContentTC: 還好、還好。要是再來晚一點，恐怕和你這次會面就是在墓園了。
11017101.Subtitle: Thank goodness. One moment later and I might have to talk to your headstone instead.

11017102.ContentTC: 我說朋友，你這次是真的闖了大禍了。你知道見皇兄一面有多難，而我又極少染指政客們的事。不過你還算走運，今早皇兄為別的事情召見我，我才求來這一紙特赦令。
11017102.Subtitle: By all that is holy, my friend, you've really landed yourself in some serious trouble. You know how hard it is to meet my brother, and how rarely I get involved with politicians. But fortune favours you today — I was summoned for a different matter and seized the opportunity to secure your pardon.

11017103.ContentTC: 不過總算，又可以呼吸自由的空氣了——想去哪兒？美術館、歌劇院？凱旋大街的酒館？還是隨便在絮語河岸吹吹風？
11017103.Subtitle: Things have finally blown over. You're free at last. Where do you want to go, the art gallery, the opera house, or just a simple stroll along Whisper River for fresh air?

11017105.ContentTC: ……你……臉色好差。看來他們沒少折磨你。等下隨我去我的居所吧，我安排我的醫生為你診治。
11017105.Subtitle: ...You... look pale. They did go rough on you. Why don't you come to my place? My personal physicians will tend to your wounds.

11017106.ContentTC: 七百多年後的今天，海伯利亞的監獄居然還在用原始野蠻、毫無人道主義可言的刑罰……那些諂媚的作家筆下“最偉大、最繁榮的時代”，簡直就是最拙劣的喜劇。
11017106.Subtitle: I can't believe after seven centuries, the prisons of Hyperborea still resort to primitive, barbaric, and utterly inhumane forms of torture... Those obsequious writers hail this era as "the greatest and most prosperous of times," which is nothing but a tragic farce.

11017107.ContentTC: 先別說這個了……達芙涅呢？
11017107.Subtitle: Let's not dwell on that... How's Daphne?

11017108.ContentTC: 放心。我聽聞你一直在護著她，這份特赦令自然也會庇護她。
11017108.Subtitle: I heard about your efforts to ensure her safety. Fear not, the pardon includes her as well.

11017109.ContentTC: 那就好……抱歉，現在的我，暫時還沒法報答你。
11017109.Subtitle: That's a relief... Sorry, I don't have anything to repay your kindness at the moment.

11017110.ContentTC: 報答——嗯……那來給我當半年保鏢如何？
11017110.Subtitle: Repay me? Hmm... How about serving as my bodyguard for six months?

11017112.ContentTC: 嗯。我要去一趟弗萊格桑省的紅溪城，大概半年的時間。這半年就由你來擔任我的近衛吧。
11017112.Subtitle: Yes. I'm assigned to oversee matters in Scarletriver in the name of royalty for about half a year. It'd be reassuring to have you by my side.

11017113.ContentTC: 你短期可能回不了軍團了。你的嫌疑並未真的洗清，現在回軍團只怕身份會尷尬。
11017113.Subtitle: And staying away from the Legion might be wise for now. The stigma of a criminal charge lingers. Going back to the Legion at this point could be awkward.

11017114.ContentTC: 今天皇兄召我會面，是要我以皇室的名義去紅溪城訪問。我便和他說，想將你作為近衛帶在身邊，他同意了。
11017114.Subtitle: I suggested your name as my aide when I was summoned today, and my brother consented.

11017115.Subtitle: You want me to leave the capital right now?

11017116.ContentTC: 嗯。想想那份文件上的一串簽名吧——迪斯瑪尼亞不知道有多少人在看不見的暗角窺視著你。你的武器可以殺死穢獸，卻擋不住來自背後的子彈。
11017116.Subtitle: Yes. Just think of those signatures — how many people are watching you in Dismania. Your prowess may deter approaching Filthoids, but not hidden assassins.

11017117.ContentTC: 我知道你在擔心什麽。西比爾·梅森和達芙涅有些故交，且在這起事件中，她明顯更相信你們無辜，所以她至少會保證達芙涅的安全。
11017117.Subtitle: I know what you're worried about. Sibylle Mason is an old friend of Daphne. She is obviously inclined to your innocence, so she will at least ensure Daphne's safety.

11017118.ContentTC: 我明白了。那就按你說的吧。需要我向你宣誓效忠之類的嗎，親王殿下？
11017118.Subtitle: I understand. Then I shall do as you say. Shall I pledge an oath of service, Your Highness?

11017119.ContentTC: ……哈，你知道我最厭惡那些老家夥的繁文縟節。不過，你總算有心情開玩笑了，這很好。
11017119.Subtitle: ...Come on, you know there's nothing I hate more than these pointless customs and etiquette. But you're in the mood for jokes now, which is a good sign.

11017120.ContentTC: 我討厭這座監獄裡的血腥味兒，準備好了我們就走吧。
11017120.Subtitle: The bloody stench of this prison is proving itself extremely noisome. Let's depart from this dismal place once you're ready.

11017123.ContentTC: （那裏有我連典獄長都沒有告訴的……<H>那個東西</>……）
11017123.Subtitle: (There is something there... that I didn't even tell the Warden...)

11017201.Subtitle: , so you're not going to ask me anything?

11017202.ContentTC: 您剛說過，軍人要無條件服從命令。
11017202.Subtitle: You just said soldiers must obey.

11017203.ContentTC: 都這份上了，你怎麽還是老樣子，像塊木雕似的。
11017203.Subtitle: Given what we've been through, are you really going to be as rigid as a piece of wood?

11017204.ContentTC: 老師，您還說過，作戰時必須集中註意力。
11017204.Subtitle: You also said that one must fully concentrate when engaging in combat.

11017205.ContentTC: 現在情況並不安全，分心批評我，會增加您的傷亡概率。
11017205.Subtitle: The current circumstances are perilous; being sidetracked by criticism might lead to casualties.

11017301.ContentTC: “獅鷲”該不會就剩你一個了？其他人什麽情況？
11017301.Subtitle: Don't tell me you're the only Griffin left alive. Where are the rest of your squad?

11017302.ContentTC: 他們在前面，大多傷得不輕。跟我來。
11017302.Subtitle: They're right ahead. Most of them are heavily injured. Please follow me.

11017403.ContentTC: 帶著卡嘉一行人離開了此處……
11017403.Subtitle: You take Katya and the guys and leave this place...

11017404.Content: 这是……继电器，总之先关闭一个

11017407.Subtitle: The water is not going down!

11017408.Subtitle: Let's get through from the side.

11017411.Content: 好，月髓连接上了【待包装】

11017412.ContentTC: 咦，被擋住了，看起來要繞一下路呢……
11017412.Subtitle: Eh? It's blocked. Seems like we need to take a detour...

11017413.ContentTC: 開關還打不開，先啟動相連的髓動輪吧。
11017413.Subtitle: The switch doesn't work, maybe I should activate the connected Phoxynamo Wheel first.

11017415.Content: 炮台的能源已经全部连通，回来汇合吧。【待包装】

11017416.ContentTC: 準備好了，就啟動髓動輪出發吧。
11017416.Subtitle: Go activate the Phoxynamo Wheels once you're ready.

11017417.ContentTC: （順著這些線纜找到髓動輪吧。）
11017417.Subtitle: (These cables should lead me to the Phoxynamo Wheels.)

11017420.ContentTC: 他們管這裡叫“模擬戰場”，說什麼……“這次的主題是冰湖城防衛戰”。
11017420.Subtitle: They refer to this place as a "Simulated Battlefield," saying that... "The theme this time is the Defence of Icelake City."

11017421.ContentTC: 聽說那個冰湖城，到處都是冰天雪地的。我還沒見過雪呢……真想去看看！
11017421.Subtitle: I heard that this Icelake City is covered in snow, something that I've never seen in my entire life... How I wish I could go there and see it myself!

11017422.Subtitle: ...I mean, if, by any chance, I could make it out alive.

11017501.ContentTC: 動力室是整座要塞的“心臟”，維持要塞運轉的能源都來自裡面那台月髓艙。
11017501.Subtitle: The engine room is the "heart" of the entire fortress, and all the power that keeps the fortress running comes from the Phoxichor tank in there.

11017502.ContentTC: 但直接攻擊月髓艙會引起爆炸，你得先去關掉四周的<H>髓動輪</>。
11017502.Subtitle: But a direct attack would only lead to explosion, so you need to shut down the Phoxynamo Wheels around it first.

11017503.ContentTC: 那些髓動輪，藍色的，你應該能認得出來吧？你現在要做的是把它們變成黃色。
11017503.Subtitle: You should be able to recognise those wheels, aka the blue ones, right? What you need to do is turn them yellow.

11017504.ContentTC: 老師，我早畢業了，不用這樣一步一步指導的。
11017504.Subtitle: I graduated a long time ago, Sir. You don't have to lead me through all the basic steps.

11017505.ContentTC: ……這小鬼！那你見機行事吧，必要時我再聯絡你。
11017505.Subtitle: ...You kiddo! Alright, play it by ear then. I'll contact you if necessary.

11017506.ContentTC: （順著地上這些線纜，應該能順利找到那些髓動輪。但願它們不要藏得太刁鑽。）
11017506.Subtitle: (Following the cables on the ground may help me get to the Phoxynamo Wheels. I hope they're not too tricky to be found.)

11017509.ContentTC: 正東方向的門搞定，可以通過了。
11017509.Subtitle: The door due east is now open. You can go that way.

11017510.ContentTC: （把髓動輪塞在這麼古怪的位置，龍莎的工程師還真不嫌麻煩。）
11017510.Subtitle: (Put the Phoxynamo Wheel in such a weird place... Those engineers sure know how to make things involved.)

11017514.ContentTC: <W>警告：檢測到髓動輪異常關閉，即將重新啟動。</>
11017514.Subtitle: WARNING: Abnormal Phoxynamo Wheel shutdown detected. Re-activating Phoxynamo Wheels now.

11017517.ContentTC: <W>警告：當前月髓艙負荷過大，有超載風險，請檢查是否啟動過多髓動輪。</>
11017517.Subtitle: WARNING: Phoxichor tank overload risk detected. Please check if more than required Phoxynamo Wheels have been activated.

11017519.ContentTC: 聽著，{nickname2}，你現在到動力室下層去，把所有備用髓動輪啟動後，立即撤離。
11017519.Subtitle: Listen, . I need you to go to the lower floor of the engine room, activate all the back-up Phoxynamo Wheels, then evacuate immediately.

11017520.ContentTC: 既然常規手段解決不了月髓艙，你就讓它自己搞壞自己。
11017520.Subtitle: Since we can't shut them down our way, we can let them do it in a self-destructive way.

11017521.ContentTC: 您指的是……利用超載炸毀月髓艙？我知道了。
11017521.Subtitle: You mean... exploding the Phoxichor tank by overloading it? Got it.

11017601.ContentTC: 1號備用髓動輪可以操作了，啟動吧。
11017601.Subtitle: Back-up Phoxynamo Wheel No.1 is ready. Now activate it.

11017602.ContentTC: 幹得好，我會把剩下三台的髓動輪的操作許可權一一解鎖。
11017602.Subtitle: Well done. I'll unlock the control authority for the remaining three Phoxynamo Wheels.

11017603.ContentTC: 等黃色燈光亮起，你就啟動它。
11017603.Subtitle: Activate them once the yellow light is on.

11017604.ContentTC: （髓動輪亮了，看來老師那邊已經解決了。）
11017604.Subtitle: (The light is on. Looks like Sir Avar has made it on his side.)

11017605.ContentTC: <W>警告：月髓艙負荷過大，已超載50%。請立即停止髓動輪設備使用，不得擅自撤離。</>
11017605.Subtitle: WARNING: Phoxichor tank is overloaded by 50%. Please shut down the Phoxynamo Wheels immediately; unauthorized departure is not permitted.

11017607.Subtitle: No.3 is also ready. Go get it!

11017609.Subtitle: Quick and clean! Well done, kid.

11017610.ContentTC: 許可權啟動了，這是最後一台！
11017610.Subtitle: The control authority is unlocked. This is the last one!

11017611.ContentTC: <W>警告：月髓艙即將損毀，請自首。</>
11017611.Subtitle: WARNING: Phoxichor tank sabotage detected. Anyone held responsible should confess your crime.

11017612.Subtitle: Run! Get behind the safety door!

11017613.ContentTC: <W>警告：月髓艙即將損毀，請自首。</>
11017613.Subtitle: WARNING: Phoxichor tank sabotage detected. Anyone held responsible should confess your crime.

11017702.ContentTC: 長官，從這裡下去，就是地下水道了。
11017702.Subtitle: Sir, we can get into the sewer tunnels from here.

11017706.ContentTC: 當心！前面有一台冷凝機，靠太近的話會受傷的！
11017706.Subtitle: Watch out! There's a condenser up ahead. You'll get hurt if you get too close!

11017707.ContentTC: 各位長官……冷凝機的蒸汽很危險，千萬不要久留。
11017707.Subtitle: Sir... Steam produced by the condenser is dangerous. We should not stay too long.

11017708.ContentTC: 呼、呼……好熱……長官，您沒事吧？
11017708.Subtitle: Huff, huff... It's so hot... Are you okay, sir?

11017712.ContentTC: 謝謝您救了我們！原來也不是所有帝國士兵都……
11017712.Subtitle: Thank you for saving our lives! It turned out not all the Imperial soldiers are...

11017713.ContentTC: 啊，抱歉！我是說，我曾經以為帝國士兵都和同盟的家夥一樣蠻橫粗暴，但現在我知道了，不是我想的那樣！
11017713.Subtitle: Ah, sorry! I mean, I used to think that Imperial soldiers were no different from those Forsaken rotters. But now I know I was wrong!

11017714.ContentTC: 前面那個是……阿瓦爾長官！
11017714.Subtitle: Over there is... Sir Avar!

11017802.ContentTC: 視野不錯，就在這兒轟擊中央控制室吧。
11017802.Subtitle: The view is good. Let's bombard the central control room from here.

11017804.ContentTC: 先處理掉穢獸，別讓它們干擾到你！
11017804.Subtitle: Take down the Filthoids first. Don't let them distract you!

11017806.ContentTC: 接下來，就從相對薄弱的<H>側門</>開始轟擊吧。
11017806.Subtitle: Next, let's start with the relatively thin side door.

11017807.ContentTC: 不要停，繼續轟擊！記得用高爆彈。
11017807.Subtitle: Keep it up! Use the High-Explosive Shells!

11017808.ContentTC: 差不多了！清理完剩下的穢獸，過去看看吧。
11017808.Subtitle: That should do it. Let's go check it out after we get rid of the remaining Filthoids.

11017809.Subtitle: Snap out of it! Keep firing!

11017810.ContentTC: 你還好吧？別是哪兒受傷了？
11017810.Subtitle: Are you okay? Did you get hurt?

11017811.ContentTC: 等你把這門敲破，我小女兒都變成老奶奶了！回去開炮。
11017811.Subtitle: By the time you break the door, my baby would've become a granny! Go back to the cannon.

11017901.ContentTC: 去吧，保持聯絡，聽我指示。
11017901.Subtitle: Go, stay in touch, and be careful.

11017903.Content: 准备好了，就激活髓动轮出发吧。

11018002.ContentTC: 接下來的任務容不得出任何錯，我們還是得排除風險——小姑娘和老人家不能跟著了。
11018002.Subtitle: We cannot afford any mistakes in our mission moving forward. We have to rule out all the potential risks — this girl and the old man, they should stop here.

11018003.ContentTC: ……為什麼？剛才您也看到了，到處都是穢獸，如果在這裡和你們分開，我和爺爺一定會沒命的！
11018003.Subtitle: ...Why? As you can see, there are Filthoids all over this place. If you leave us here, Mr Frank and I will die!

11018004.ContentTC: 長官，我幫過您的！您想，我剛剛給您帶路，幫您順利會合……求求您……求求您不要拋下我們！
11018004.Subtitle: Sir, please! We offered help, we led you all the way here so you could rendezvous with them... Please... I'm begging you, don't leave us behind!

11018006.ContentTC: 老師也許多慮了。如果他們是敵人，那麼在地下水道故意帶錯路會是更好的選擇，但他們沒有這麼做。
11018006.Subtitle: Maybe you're overthinking it, sir. If they were enemies, misleading us in the sewer tunnels would be a better idea, but they didn't do that.

11018007.ContentTC: 如果他們另有打算呢。你不覺得，剛才這一路，他們“過於瞭解”這座要塞了嗎？
11018007.Subtitle: What if they're up to something else? Don't you think that they are "too familiar" with everything of this fortress along the way?

11018010.ContentTC: 如果是進中央控制室之前，我還可以勉強信任你；但是現在看來你似乎“過於瞭解”這座要塞了。
11018010.Subtitle: I could have trusted you if we haven't got into the central control room. But now it seems to me that you're just "too familiar" with this fortress.

11018011.ContentTC: 中央控制室是龍莎要塞的中樞，就算是同盟，也不會允許路邊隨便抓來的苦力來這種核心區域閒逛。
11018011.Subtitle: The central control room is the core of Lonza Fortress, even the Forsakens wouldn't let their enslaved labor hang out in such an essential place.

11018012.ContentTC: 你不該對裡面的路線也如此輕車熟路。
11018012.Subtitle: You're not supposed to know the routes so well.

11018014.ContentTC: 小姑娘，這麼喜歡演戲，還是去皇都的大劇院演吧。
11018014.Subtitle: If you're so interested in acting, little girl, I suggest you find a job in the Grand Theatre in the capital.

11018015.ContentTC: 時間不多了，我們走。萊昂，留下來看好他們。
11018015.Subtitle: We're running out of time. Let's go. Leon, stay here and keep an eye on them.

20000402.Subtitle: Hey, you! Yes, you! The kid over there.

20000502.ContentTC: 和白長得很像的……小妹妹？
20000502.Subtitle: A girl who looks just like... Snow?

20000504.ContentTC: 你、你叫誰小妹妹！現在的年輕人呐，真是越來越不像話啦。
20000504.Subtitle: Who are you calling "girl"? The younger generation nowadays is so disrespectful.

20000505.ContentTC: 你呀，要講禮貌！雖然皎皎之民大家看上去都和白一樣年輕，但她的年齡其實已經可以當你外婆的外婆的外婆啦……
20000505.Subtitle: You should watch what you say! Although all Lunarians look young, she's actually as old as your great-great-grandmother.

20000506.ContentTC: （眼前扛著錘子的“女孩”，與早些時間認識的白，她們的外貌和聲音如此相似，但年齡閱歷卻似乎完全不同——<H>皎皎之民</>），真是一群不可思議的家夥。
20000506.Subtitle: (The young "girl" with a hammer had a similar voice and appearance as Snow, but their age and experiences were completely different. Lunos are indeed peculiar.)

20000508.Subtitle: Very well. I'll let it slide this time.

20000510.ContentTC: 算了，老朽不和小孩子計較。
20000510.Subtitle: Never mind, arguing with a youngster isn't worth my time.

20000511.ContentTC: 其實呢，剛剛你們路過的時候啊，老朽嗅到了了不得的東西。
20000511.Subtitle: Actually, I caught a whiff of something remarkable as you passed by just now.

20000512.ContentTC: 沒錯，就是<H>稀世神兵</>的味道！年輕人，你是不是藏著什麼了不得的武器？
20000512.Subtitle: That's right. It's the scent of a legendary weapon! Do you have any special weapons on you, kiddo?

20000513.Subtitle: This sword is all I have.

20000515.ContentTC: （她仔細打量著這把劍，仿佛想要從它的紋路裡讀出什麼。）
20000515.Subtitle: (She carefully examined the sword, attempting to glean some information from its pattern.)

20000516.ContentTC: 好劍、好劍呀！這劍無論是看材質還是手法，都不是海伯利亞這群庸才的手筆。你年紀輕輕，怎麼弄到這種寶貝的？
20000516.Subtitle: Jesus! That's incredible! Look at the texture and the craftsmanship! This clearly wasn't made by those mediocre Hyperborean blacksmiths. Where did you get it?

20000517.ContentTC: （在這位皎皎鐵匠的眼中，這把劍似乎並不同尋常。）
20000517.Subtitle: (The Luno blacksmith recognised that this sword was no ordinary weapon. )

20000520.ContentTC: 從我記事起，這把劍就在我身邊了。也許是我父母留下的？
20000520.Subtitle: I got it when I was young. Maybe it was passed down to me by my parents?

20000522.ContentTC: 有趣，有趣。老朽當了一輩子鐵匠，也要甘拜下風啦。
20000522.Subtitle: Intriguing. Very intriguing. I've been a blacksmith my whole life, yet I've never seen a weapon like this before.

20000523.ContentTC: 年輕人啊，老朽常年漂泊在外，居無定所。要不，就讓老朽跟隨你一陣子？
20000523.Subtitle: Kiddo, I'm Lunosmith, a wandering blacksmith. Would you mind if I accompanied you on your journey?

20000524.ContentTC: 從海伯利亞到艾利西安，老朽見過、鍛造過的武器可多啦！如果你想鍛造什麼兵器，就包在我身上吧。
20000524.Subtitle: I've travelled all over the land, from Hyperborea to Elysium, and I've forged countless weapons. If you require any weapons, I'm at your disposal.

20000525.Subtitle: Wow! So you're an experienced master blacksmith!

20000526.ContentTC: 價錢肯定比外面的鐵匠便宜！你只要讓我得空研究研究你那把劍就好了，哈哈。
20000526.Subtitle: All I request is a basic salary, and an opportunity to examine your sword, hehe.

20000528.ContentTC: 呵……年輕人的表情，這是在懷疑老朽吧。
20000528.Subtitle: Look, I can see scepticism written on your face.

20000529.ContentTC: 你大可放心——「皎皎永遠不會主動傷害他人」，這是整片阿特拉西亞大陸人盡皆知的事實。
20000529.Subtitle: You can trust me. You must know the saying, "Lunos never harm." Everyone in Atlasia knows that.

20000531.ContentTC: （沒錯，身為皎皎的白就是一個熱心腸的孩子。更何況，對於兩個一無所有的人，一名鐵匠又能圖謀什麼呢？）
20000531.Subtitle: (She was right. You could see that trait in Snow. Besides, what could she get from you? You have nothing to offer.)

20000532.ContentTC: 嗯，我想多了。那我們一起回去吧。
20000532.Subtitle: Yeah, you're right. Let's head back together then.

20000533.ContentTC: 看樣子年輕人這是答應啦。好，好！快帶老朽去你的住處吧！
20000533.Subtitle: So you'll have me? Excellent! Then take me to where you live.

20000602.ContentTC: 說起來，我在路上也看到了和白，還有鐵匠前輩長得很相似的人。她們也是<H>皎皎</>嗎？
20000602.Subtitle: I've seen many who resemble you and Snow. Are they also Lunos?

20000603.ContentTC: 年輕人，你是不是從什麼偏僻地方來的？
20000603.Subtitle: Did you come from a remote village or something, kiddo?

20000604.ContentTC: 是的……我的故鄉確實不算繁華。
20000604.Subtitle: Yes, my hometown isn't a big city.

20000605.ContentTC: 哈哈，難怪，難怪。畢竟在老朽走過的地方啊，有人類的地方就有皎皎。像你這樣沒見過我們一族的孩子，已經不多啦。
20000605.Subtitle: Ha, that explains it. In all my travels, wherever there are humans, Lunos can always be found. It's quite uncommon to come across someone like you who's never heard of us.

20000606.ContentTC: 我們皎皎之民呀，每個人都和白長得一樣可愛，而且擁有很長的壽命。
20000606.Subtitle: We share a similar appearance. Everyone is as attractive as me. And we live very long lives.

20000607.ContentTC: 而且就像鐵匠前輩一樣，大家每個人都有很擅長的事！
20000607.Subtitle: Like the master blacksmith, every Luno has a particular forte.

20000608.ContentTC: 哇哦。那麼白也有一技之長嗎？
20000608.Subtitle: Wow. Do you have any unique talents, Snow?

20000609.Subtitle: Yeah... Hmm... Of course, I do!

20000610.ContentTC: 那個那個，你能看到吧！白和所有皎皎都長得不一樣！
20000610.Subtitle: As you can see, I have demonic appendages on my head. No other Lunos have these!

20000611.ContentTC: 的確。老朽活了這麼大歲數，也是第一次看到你這樣的皎皎之民。這模樣，和<H>卡戎之民</>頗有些相似……
20000611.Subtitle: Indeed. In all my years, I've never seen a Luno with horns like those. You look just like those Charons.

20000612.ContentTC: 所以說嘛，白是獨一無二的魔王皎皎！說不定呀，白就是為了帶領皎皎們征服世界而誕生的！
20000612.Subtitle: Sooo, I'm the special and unique Luno the Demon King. Perhaps I was meant to lead the Lunos and dominate the world!

20000614.ContentTC: 唉，普通皎皎確實沒什麼野心，她們就喜歡跟著人類，只要得到人類的誇獎就會開心得轉圈……但對白來說，這可遠遠不夠！
20000614.Subtitle: Unfortunately, most Lunos lack ambition. They'd rather follow the humans, and are content with just a few words of appreciation. But for me, I want so much more!

20000615.ContentTC: 小僕從，你一定要陪白一起修行哦，等白征服了世界，就冊封你為魔王大人的軍團長！到時候，咱們讓前輩好好瞧瞧！
20000615.Subtitle: My little minion, you must stick with me. After I conquer the world, you'll be the leader of my legion! Just you wait and see!

20000618.ContentTC: 唔……每天二十張魔王大人的親筆簽名誇獎信？哎呀到時候再說啦，總之，絕對不會虧待你的。
20000618.OptionTopic: 你说的那个军团长给开多少工钱啊？
20000618.Subtitle: Hmm... How about 20 letters of praise written by this Demon King? Anyway, we can talk about the details when the time comes. All you need to know is that I'll never let you down.

20000620.ContentTC: （這不是和普通的皎皎沒什麼區別嗎！）
20000620.Subtitle: (Wow, so unique and different from other Lunos...)

20000805.ContentTC: 我們之前說過的，我來看看你。

20000807.ContentTC: 你的眼睛……又看不清了嗎，和在廢礦那時一樣？

20000808.ContentTC: 嗯，這會兒看東西有點模模糊糊的……沒事的，是老毛病啦。

20000809.ContentTC: 應該是因為最近有點累，稍微休息幾天就會好的！

20000810.ContentTC: 你剛剛怎麽一個人在這裏嘆氣？

20000811.ContentTC: 你剛剛怎麽對著這盆花嘆氣？

20000812.ContentTC: 我是想去的！但是恩里克叔叔囑咐過我不要四處走動。所以——啊！對了，既然你來了……

20000815.ContentTC: 這盆花……能幫我看看它開得怎麽樣嗎？

20000816.ContentTC: （你打量著那盆花——它看上去狀況並不太好，莖葉有些發黃，花瓣也沒有多少光澤。）

20000818.ContentTC: ……謝謝，其實你不必為了照顧我的感受而說謊。

20000819.ContentTC: 我剛才摸到，好像有些花瓣已經起了褶皺，想必花的情況是不太好的。

20000820.ContentTC: 你能再仔細地看一看嗎？為了將花朵照料好，觀察是很重要的。

20000821.ContentTC: 花朵是明黃色的……很有活力的顏色。

20000822.ContentTC: 嗯，我很喜歡黃色的花，會讓人想到陽光，心裏暖暖的……

20000823.ContentTC: 花瓣的尖端邊緣不是光滑的，有許多不規則的小缺口。

20000824.ContentTC: 沒錯……你可以輕輕地摸一下試試。我很喜歡撫摸它的花瓣邊緣，每一片花瓣劃過指尖的感受都不一樣，就像是在訴說自己的故事……

20000825.ContentTC: 但是，現在這些花瓣看上去沒什麽光澤，邊緣有些深色的卷曲，像是燒焦了……

20000826.ContentTC: 唔……我想，它可能是缺水了。

20000827.ContentTC: 花瓣上有柔軟的紋路，從內向外展開，和葉子的脈絡有點像。但是，似乎不太飽滿……

20000828.ContentTC: 那是用來輸送養分的紋路，確實和葉脈的作用相似。

20000829.ContentTC: 雖然人們總是更加關註花朵，但花和葉其實沒那麽不同，它們都在努力呼吸生長。

20000830.ContentTC: 讓我想想……不太飽滿的話，應該是缺少養分了。

20000831.ContentTC: 現在我大概知道是怎麽回事了，謝謝你。

20000833.ContentTC: 不，它原本是很堅韌的品種，即使是在冰湖城這樣的長冬之地也能存活。

20000834.ContentTC: 只要能好好修剪、施肥、處理濕度和溫度，它應該能開得很好、很久……是我疏忽了。我離爸爸媽媽那樣優秀的花匠還差得遠。

20000835.ContentTC: 是這樣沒錯，但……啊，等一下，{nickname}，我想到了！

20000836.ContentTC: 同在冰湖城，應該沒有什麽不一樣的……啊，我想到了！

20000839.ContentTC: 對。我家培育的花會用一種特別的土壤，這種土壤是爸爸從冰湖城外的一處山洞采集的。

20000840.ContentTC: 以前爸爸好像說過，那裏的土壤會比尋常土壤更肥沃些。也許我可以去——

20000842.ContentTC: 這好辦，我幫你取一些吧。

20000843.ContentTC: 你只要陪我說說話就好，不用那麽——

20000844.ContentTC: 沒事，委托總是要出城的，舉手之勞。你說的那個山洞在哪裡？

20000846.ContentTC: 不，我想……應該不用和你說這些客氣話了。

20000847.ContentTC: 我來和你說一下山洞的位置……

20000901.ContentTC: 賽琪，我把山洞的土壤帶回來了，你看看，是你說的那種嗎？

20000902.ContentTC: 嗯……這些土壤的觸感……確實和爸爸從前用的一模一樣。

20000903.ContentTC: 你找了好多啊……這樣一來，這裏的花都能開得更好了。

20000904.ContentTC: 你開心就好，看來沒白跑一趟。

20000905.ContentTC: （賽琪摩挲著泥土，沈浸在喜悅中。而你則突然想起了那朵花——賽琪給你的那朵。）

20000906.ContentTC: （你將它拿了出來。雖然已經過了一段時間，但它的花蕾依舊完好地舒展著，安靜地躺在你的掌心。）

20000907.ContentTC: 呀，是這一朵……你一直好好帶在身上呢！

20000908.ContentTC: 畢竟是珍貴的禮物嘛。不過，你這麽寶貝這些花，摘下來送給我，不會很心疼嗎？

20000909.ContentTC: 心疼……嗯，我還是心疼過的。不過，是在小的時候。

20000910.ContentTC: 你見過花店裡出售的鮮切花吧？其實，那時候我很不喜歡鮮切花……我覺得被剪下來的花很可憐。

20000911.ContentTC: 花和根、莖、葉一樣，都是植物的一部分。可人們卻為了欣賞花的美麗，把它單獨剪下來觀賞，讓它離開枝幹，孤零零地死去。

20000912.ContentTC: 從我們的角度看也許是這樣……

20000913.ContentTC: 你剛才說「小時候」……現在你改變看法了？

20000915.ContentTC: 我可以先問你一個問題嗎？對於那些被摘下的花朵，你是怎麽看的？

20000916.ContentTC: 嗯……看來把花送給你是對的，你一定會好好養護它們。

20000917.ContentTC: 嗯……我明白，我也是這麽想的。

20000918.ContentTC: 你和我小時候想的一樣呢。

20000919.ContentTC: 現在的我啊，看到被切下來的花，還是會有點難過。但是，我也漸漸發覺，那些鮮切花很了不起，比我想象中更了不起。

20000920.ContentTC: 明明從被切斷的那一刻起，它們就註定無法結出果實，只能慢慢枯萎——

20000921.ContentTC: 但是它們還是會拼命吸收水分，在短暫的時間裏竭盡全力盛開，仿佛它們還有根，仿佛它們從未被剪下。

20000922.ContentTC: 所以現在，我不可憐它們，我敬佩它們。

20000924.ContentTC: 你真善良……嗯，你說的沒錯……如果不曾被切下，就更好了。

20000925.ContentTC: 啊，一不小心就把話題搞沈重起來了，我的錯我的錯——

20000926.ContentTC: 謝謝你帶回來的土壤，濕度和松軟程度正合適……說不定你也有園藝方面的天分呢！

20000927.ContentTC: 好呀，我會把我了解的所有竅門都教給你的！……如果有時間。

20000930.ContentTC: 除了爸爸媽媽，不會有人把我微不足道的話記掛在心。更不用說為了一盆花，費這麽大工夫了。

20000931.ContentTC: 這是報酬。雖然不值多少錢，還是希望你能收下！

20000932.ContentTC: 等這些花兒重新開好了，你記得回來看看。

20001001.ContentTC: 這裡的土壤好像有點幹燥……再去別的地方看看吧。

20001201.ContentTC: 找到了……！這裏的土壤比較松軟，濕度看起來也合適，多挖一點回去吧。

20001303.ContentTC: 找不到也沒關系的，不要勉強……

20001401.ContentTC: 對了對了，我還有幾件事要問你。

20001402.ContentTC: 你有沒有親自到天之樹腳下去過呀，它是不是真的有傳說中那——麽大，大到遮天蔽日？從下往上看，會不會像……滿天都是水晶？

20001403.ContentTC: 還有還有……海邊的沙子是不是都是軟綿綿的，踩上去像面粉一樣，一點兒也不硌腳？

20001404.ContentTC: 問題可能會有點多！是幫大家問的……嘿嘿，不要嫌我煩哦！

20001501.ContentTC: 嗯……有這些應該夠了，回去交給賽琪吧。

20001603.Content: 赛琪怎么还没出来，我们去瞅瞅吧。【临时版】

20001701.ContentTC: 想要阻止穢蝕者並非易事，先做好準備再出城找賽琪吧。

20001802.ContentTC: 白，跟在我們後面，趁著風小一點的時候一起向前。

20001803.ContentTC: 風太大的時候也可以躲在石頭後面，別著急。

20001901.ContentTC: 遠處的冰湖上刮起了風暴，賽琪應該就在那個方向……

20002002.ContentTC: 就像是……在為我們引路一樣……

20002101.ContentTC: 這些穢獸都半死不活的，很可能是和賽琪交過手。

20002102.ContentTC: 看來只要沿著它們的反方向，就能找到賽琪了……

20002203.Content: 外面情况怎么样？【临时版】

20002204.Content: 刮了好大的风，秽兽的行为也很反常。【临时版】

20002301.ContentTC: （已經失去理智的賽琪正在與穢蝕對抗……應該為她做些什麽……）

20002402.ContentTC: 應該是因為城外人比較少吧，在還有最後一點理智的時候，儘量去人少的地方去。

20002502.ContentTC: 找到她的話，不要猶豫，結束她的痛苦吧，我想她也希望你們這麼做……

20002601.ContentTC: 爸爸，剛剛那個大姐姐怎麼跑那麼快？

20002602.ContentTC: 別問了，快走，快到城裡去，那是穢蝕者！

20002603.ContentTC: 別……別慌……已經有人去找衛戍部隊了！

20002604.ContentTC: 你們不要想趁機溜進城裡，通行證，出示通行證！

20002605.ContentTC: 求求你們讓我們進去吧，通行證真的只是不小心弄丟了！

20002606.ContentTC: 都什麼時候了還通行證，反正在外面也是死，不如直接沖進去！

20002607.ContentTC: 停，停，你們再過來我就開槍了！

20002608.ContentTC: 開啊！開槍把穢蝕者引過來我們一起死！

20002609.ContentTC: 你……算你狠。行吧，先進來，等衛戍部隊處理掉穢蝕者再說。

20002701.ContentTC: 好大的風……直接跳下去會被吹飛的。

20002702.ContentTC: 那邊，我們坐升降機下去。

20002801.ContentTC: 沒事的，我們知道了賽琪去了哪裡，跟上去就是。

20002802.ContentTC: 嗯，沒錯，只要找到賽琪，就一定會有辦法的！

20002901.ContentTC: （已經和奧特賽德和白交代好了今天發生的所有事。）

20002902.ContentTC: （接下來能做的，就只有在說好的地方……耐心等待。）

20003302.ContentTC: 嗯？是你啊。別忘了晚上見。

20004501.ContentTC: 我最親愛的孩子，謝謝你來到世界上。

20004503.ContentTC: 賽琪，來拉鉤，我們要做一輩子的好朋友！

20004506.ContentTC: 命運啊，求你憐憫我唯一一次，讓我幫她實現這個願望吧。
